r:
[i]"Doomed" does not always refer to the fate Skaia reserves for alternate timelines and those who fall outside of its plans. The most selfish and arrogant trolls in all Paradox Space will explore the multiple senses of the word; many innocents will share their dark destiny.[/i]

In 2023, the classic adventure Alabaster is back for more horror and tragedy!

---------------------

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed001.png[/IMG]

Does this game think you're a pansy? Oh yeah, dude, it's the ultrasecret absolutely unfathomable adventure, you can't stand too much blood. Oh god, you're so afraid.

You resolutely select the most shocking amount of content, the DOUBLE RAINBOW EXTREME censorship level. This game will learn how much of a man you are.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed002.png[/IMG]

And now this. You will have nothing of this pretentious, nonsensical babble the most traditionalist idiots are calling dignified language. All these foreign-sounding words like [i]bathtub[/i] or [i]safe[/i] just give you headaches. You are a modern man, you are young, you are the real deal, and the world will know about it.

You proudly select the LOWEST BLOOD language level.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed003.png[/IMG]

Since the parameters have been modified, no one will be allowed to name you. And that's alright by you. No naming is the right way to do it. You will not stand being named by some random person. You aren't the average troll kid. Also, you're not a kid at all. You are a MAN. You are the hype thing, you are the sports thing, you are the sexy thing.

Your name is VAMUIN IKENGA.

You have a large variety of INTERESTS, all of them being the most POPULAR AND STYLISH THINGS EVER. You are mainly an AWESOME SURFER, but you're also good at ALTERNIAN FOOTBALL, WILD SKATEBOARDING, BASKETBALL, BASEBALL, and MUSCLEBEAST DECAPITATEBALL. You organize CRAZY PARTIES where you invite everyone you know and don't know, and also MORE TIGHT PARTIES with only the most popular and beautiful young persons.

Your muscular, tall and handsome body, DEEPLY TANNED by moonburn naps every night and ultraviolet sessions every day, displays PIERCINGS, but NOT TOO MANY OF THEM, because the last thing you desire is to not be wanted or accepted everywhere, by everyone. That is also why you know ALTERNATIVE MUSIC, but don't listen to it frequently, and that's the very reason you don't allow yourself to PAINT or to SING or to PLAY VIDEOGAMES everyday.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed004.png[/IMG]

GLOBETROTTING is pretty rare amongst the young trolls, but you traveled all around the world, mainly because it impresses everyone. You tried all kind of jobs and you like to think and claim you were always astounding at it. You trained well in order to join the ALTERNIAN ARMY someday, like all adults in your species. You seduced myriads of magnificent trolls. 

You are a HIGH LEVEL PSIONIC. You are as strong as one can get without being a freak. You have the most stylish lusus. You have A LOT OF FRIENDS, because being ill with friendship is quite the hype thing these days. And of course, ALL OF YOUR ROMANCE QUADRANTS ARE FILLED. You are NOT PARTICULARLY LOYAL to them, however, because you're just too cool to be the man of only four trolls.

You are also NINE SWEEPS OLD, the troll equivalent to NINETEEN HUMAN YEARS, because there is no way the most awesome of awesome awesomies can't do the bucket thing. No. Way. In. Hell. And ALL OF THE PEOPLE YOU WILL EVER MEET will be nine sweeps old too.

Furthermore, you are THE HIGHEST POSSIBLE BLOOD WITHOUT BEING SOME KIND OF FISHY FREAK. Aquatic fauna just isn't sexy enough.

You have just installed a new pirated game, but you have not launched it yet. Your trolltag is [color=#045FB4]righteousPornstar[/color] and [color=#045FB4]yo°u like to° indicate yo°ur magnificent nipple piercing because, co°me o°n, it's just that aweso°me![/color]

p.c: Vamuin: Hide those filthy buckets on your wall AT ONCE.
p.b:
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed005.png[/IMG]

You see no reason to hide these buckets. You are an ADULT now, nearly of age to JOIN THE ARMY. You are perfectly at ease with your sexuality.

Contemplating these posters makes you kind of aroused, actually. Maybe you should search for some new faces in the concupiscent department.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed006.gif[/IMG]

Oh, it's this little pervert. This is not good pailing material. Whatever. You are currently lacking someone to impress, and his conversations are always pretty funny, yet pretty disturbing.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed018.png[/IMG]

Things are finally looking fine. You think a lot more clearly.

On the downside, the night isn't so young anymore. You couldn't help yourself around this subtle and distinguished (not to mention very normal) lady, and now it's nearly midnight. You need to go kill something quickly if you want keep some time in order to try your games before daybreak.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed019.png[/IMG]

But firstly you should probably dress.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed020.png[/IMG]

You do not entirely succeed. You can't find your shirt anymore. Where the hell did you throw it? No time to choose another, since you usually spend a whole hour selecting your clothes.

Furthermore, shirtless hunt is sexier.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed021.png[/IMG]

You easily find your hornet-flavored tentacles all over the respiteblock. You take a break to eat some.

Actually, no. You can't stand the shape.

These tentacles are part of a species of little aquatic creatures you don't care about, but it is not the problem here. Vegetarian diet is extremely rare on Alternia.

No, you simply dislike any kind of tentacles. You practice, try or at least respect a lot of things in your romance life, but there are dark areas you sincerely believe trollkind was never meant to explore. Ginneo's... thing... is one of them. Tentacles are another. It creeps you so much even without any pailing context, you still find them nightmarish.

So you never touch these sweeties. But you buy them anyway. After all, it's this kind of delicacy which makes the most successful parties.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed022.png[/IMG]

Time to get some fresh air.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed023.png[/IMG]

As the sublimest troll ever, you clearly deserve the most grandiose custodian. So of all creatures available to a mighty PURPLE BLOOD, you share a mutualistic link with a majestic GRIFFIN LUSUS, every bit as powerful and condescending as you.

You named your lusus VICTORY, because it sums up precisely the entirety of your life. 

You don't get why some people seem to despise you.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed024.png[/IMG]

Sky is clear, night is calm. Today will be the best day of your life.

You captchalogue the SICKLEHEAD SHARK inside your SYLLADEX using your usual WAVE MODUS.

The wave modus works as a huge wave going through the entire inventory screen.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed032.png[/IMG]

One must be very quick and move the surfboard cursor on the card he intends to use...

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed033.png[/IMG]

... then activate it at the exact right time...

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed034.png[/IMG]

... in order to get the item captchalogued at the desired place. 

Since you have the most amazing reflexes, this modus represents no challenge to you.

It would be the most boring inventory system ever if there was not an added risk: the wave has one chance in a million to turn into a tsunami and to disintegrate every single item you carry with you.

But such random disaster has clearly no chance to happen.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed035.png[/IMG]

Besides your collection of paddles in all possible categories, all remaining inside your STRIFE SPECIBUS, you are currently the happy possessor of more items than a single page of screen could ever load:

[spoiler open="VAMUIN IKENGA'S SYLLADEX" close="Close sylladex"][left][b]- YOUR ENTIRE COLLECTION OF EXTRA-NEW, RETRO, VINTAGE, UNDERGROUND OR PERSONALIZED SURF BOARDS[/b]

p.b:
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed041.png[/IMG]

In spite of your months of training in SIMULTANEOUS POSING-COOKING-RIDING, you feel more comfortable cooking at hive. And you still have work to do before you can return to your beloved lair.

You are heading towards the hunt. You have a lot of favourite destinations, but today, you are late due to your ardent raynbow-roleplay-cybersex and the following badass cliff-dive-fishing. You will only be able to reach the three closest ones within your schedule.

Firstly, to the north is set the FOREST OF RAVAGE. It is the PUISSANT FIREDOGS' territory.

Secondarly, to the east, you can find the MEADOWS OF AGONY. Entire herds of MIGHTY EQUINELATERALS await for preys during the night.

Finally, to the south, the DESERT OF CALAMITY is in your reach.  It contains myriads of BRAWNY APOCALIZARDS.

Also, you switched out of Cine Mode. This tends to happen a lot.
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed042.png[/IMG]

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed043.png[/IMG]

Both of you head towards the meadows accelerated and protected by your lusus' psionic powers, effectively reaching hypersonic speed without getting reduced to ashes by the friction.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed044.png[/IMG]

Your celerity can be measured as Mach 7, or maybe Mode 7, like suggested by the abstract scrolling ground far down below.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed045.png[/IMG]

Cinema being the 7th Art, Mode 7 also means you are re-entering Cine Mode.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed046.png[/IMG]

You reach the meadows in less than ten minutes.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed047.png[/IMG]

MUSCLEBEASTS are usually found in groups of three, traditionally and misleadingly known to mundane trolls by the informal word TRIUMVIRATE.

Two fat, round, hairy beasts follow the leader, far more elongated, powerful and hard-boiled.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed048.png[/IMG]

You're lucky. These EQUINELATERALS are part of the particularly violent GWERNIKA subspecies. This could be a challenge.

In what kind of manner will you humiliate and obliterate them?

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed049.png[/IMG]

The TRADITIONAL DEPICTIONS OF ALTERNIAN FAUNA are indeed accurate, as they are based on the immortal works of the great troll polymath [url=./assets/img/special/troll_lenard.png]LENARD DAVINC[/url], but you will not see it, even if the censorship level was previously defined as DOUBLE RAINBOW EXTREME. There are some things in this world - or rather in this other world - the human eye is not meant to see, and the interface is not meant to show.

Consequently, in this sequence, all framing will be very carefully chosen.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed068.png[/IMG]

Trolls are different. Trolls like the bitterness.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed069.png[/IMG]

You skin the beast alive.

p.c: Vamuin: Extract the blood with the Hemosucking Mosquitfridgerator.
p.b:
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed070.png[/IMG]

This item is not currently CAPTCHALOGUED into your SYLLADEX! You have forgotten to take it before departing for the hunt.

Without the HEMOSUCKING MOSQUITFRIDGERATOR, you can't properly achieve your preparation of the carcass.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed071.png[/IMG]

You also have forgotten some other details.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed072.png[/IMG]

Firstly, a triumvirate works by empathic communication. The three entities are linked, almost functioning as a tiny hivemind.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed072b.png[/IMG]

When one triumvir expires, it's perceived like an unbearable mutilation. Furthermore, pain and terror are shared.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed073.png[/IMG]

Secondly, similarly to many other pseudo-insectoid Alternian species, the reproductive cycle of the Equinelaterals implies mixing and toss of fluids, and therefore the creation of an incestuous slurry presiding to the birth of new individuals.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed073b.png[/IMG]

A triumvirate needs all three members in order to reproduce.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed073c.png[/IMG]

One lost member means a lifetime of castration, adding to the rage and desperation.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed074.png[/IMG]

Final omission: you did not finish the third one.
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed075.png[/IMG]
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed076.png[/IMG]
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed077.png[/IMG]
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed078.png[/IMG]
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed079.png[/IMG]
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed080.png[/IMG]
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed081.png[/IMG]
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed082.png[/IMG]

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed083.png[/IMG]

You were never in actual danger.

You always keep an ace up your sleeve.

No, not an ace. A gamebreaker.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed084.png[/IMG]

Your matesprit always boasts about how much of a badass you are.

That's wrong, even if you are too fierce to admit what you know to be true. You are cheating. The ultimate power is always here, in your ardent eyes.

Interesting detail: as a matter of fact, this picture is a flash-back dated from last week. Your matesprit is now dead, and you don't know it yet.

p.c: Narration: Look at painting. Is that an Andy Wartroll painting?
p.b:
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed085.png[/IMG]

It was veritably a painting by [url=./assets/img/special/andywartroll.png]ANDY WARTROLL[/url], the great strategist, fighter and pop artist from ten centuries ago. It was a legacy from the family of Tozy's lusus, passed from generation to generation until this particular party, when a very angry and corpulent troll spilled beer all over its surface.

Before the accident, another guest, the Artisan, spent a lot of time contemplating the painting silently. During the entire party, he principally remained silent. And watched.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed086.gif[/IMG]

You captchalogue the remains of your abusively overkilled enemies and jump back to VICTORY.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed087.gif[/IMG]

You also captchalogue your Decapitateball equipment. Playtime is over for now.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed088.png[/IMG]

Or maybe it isn't.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed089.png[/IMG]

There are a lot of AXOLOTLS glinding in the sky tonight, and you even notice rarer creatures accompanying the swarms. As long as you don't turn your back to them, most of these animals are easy prey to your custodian's BREATH OF FIRE.

One last moment of fun is available to you before coming back to your post-party-devastation, currently-lonely and permanently-harassed-by-stupid-contacts respiteblock.

<iframe scrolling="no" class="major" style="width:800px; height:500px; border: 0;" src="./assets/flash/skytroll/index.html"></iframe>

[left][spoiler open="OPEN TECHNICAL DETAILS" close="CLOSE TECHNICAL DETAILS"]Skytroll is a 2011 Alabaster game which became lost media then got salvaged by Snake, Skye and Steelo.
The known bugs are:
- Broken loading: The percentage stays stuck at 89%. Don't worry and click on the title.
- Potential lag: On some browsers the game may be slower. You can try it through different interfaces for better results, Google Chrome is generally better.[/spoiler][/left]

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed091.png[/IMG]

The moon is still high in the sky when you return to your HUGE MODERN HIVE.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed092.png[/IMG]

You leave Victory on the verandah with HALF OF ONE PRECISELY-COOKED WING OF DOUBLE-HEADED KILLER WHALE.

Seems like some troll's lusus passed by and left you a LETTER.

A overly-perfumed letter.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed093.png[/IMG]

[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[color=#868A08][i]My dearest Vamuyn,


My heart ys heavy v-vyth the v-veyght of v-vhat Y must ympart to thee. Our dallyance must be delayed, for somethyng of the utmost ymportance has become knov-vn to me and must be dealt v-vyth. Alas, Y cannot say v-vhat yt ys. But my heart ys gladdened by happy memoryes of our tryst before, and fondly Y look forv-vard to more of the same v-vyth thee anon.


Your sv-veet Batory[/color]

[/i][/spoiler]
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed094.png[/IMG] This girl is all talk and no play, by the look of it. Maybe you'll anonymously send her pics to xttp://aww.myexpails.alt when you're through with her.

[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed095.gif[/IMG]

A lot of people missed you. It is always like this. You can never be idle for too long. You are too important.

p.c: Vamuin: See the most important message.
p.b:
[IMG]./assets/img/story/doomed096.png[/IMG]

Tozy has been talking to you!

Your matesprit will not be there for the beginning of the SGRUBrip session. Even more alarming, he went to another guy's hive. 

Tozy is usually a little wimp trying to pretend he's a real bad boy. Maybe this time he felt like manning up for once. Maybe he even felt like breaking up with you.

You are now lacking two Players. You need someone. Someone who can launch the game immediately and play as your Server. It is time to get this tutorial working.

Sectra is online, but you want her to be the last to enter, because you never forgave her her past rejection. She will enter when everyone is online.

So you need another person besides the players you already found in order to start the game.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed102.png[/img]

The aristocratic dude is not dangerous. Tozy is... fine.

You feel more relieved than you will ever admit to be.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed103.png[/img]


UU and MP are the two remaining online contacts since you will not answer to neither your kismesis nor your auspistice. Hem and Wey are probably in for some insane overreacting lecture like Via was, anyway. Useless quadrants. They all talk to you like you were some irresponsible child these days.

Only Tozy is truly worthy of your attention, and apparently, he is going to be fine. You do not see any need to talk to this terminallyCapricious, he does not seem able to threaten anyone with a bulge or with a knife. Besides, you do not have his AIM address.

Via is clearly unbalanced, worrying about nothing, and she is inappropriately interfering with another quadrant. Are you the only one to know the right way to romance these days?

Time to get a player.
UU or MP. MP or UU.
Really, it is like choosing between plague and cholera.
You could talk to Sectra, too. Without telling her you are starting the game now and still need a Server, of course.
It is also time to do some hacking and configuration work again, before launching the game. Afterwards, it will be too late. The data you have ripped from the downloaded rom indicates the software merely works as a portal, redirecting all functionnalities to some cosmical hardware, or magicalware, or whatever.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed104.png[/img]

In a wandering move you are about to regret, you choose to recruit UU.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed107.png[/img] [i][u]The Glub[/u][/i], by Edvard Munchk, is one of the most fundamental painting masterpieces in all troll history. It represents the final destiny of the entire species in one of the oldest (and, according to the majority of people, most ridiculous) myths. You didn't care about the mastery of colors, the dynamic perspective, the strongness of the brush. You didn't care about the deepness and truth of the absolute angst expressed by this artist. The whole expressionist movement was always a mystery to you. Those guys looked like they couldn't paint properly without doing a bunch of mistakes, a grub could do better. Yep. You never understood this picture.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed108.png[/img]

Until now.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed109.png[/img]

You end wisely this affable conversation with Ophiuchus the Great by shutting down your computer manually.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed110.png[/img]

You spend an entire hour crying in the corner.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed111.png[/img]

Then you call the cops.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed112.png[/img]

Afterwards, you temporarely remove the wireless connection of your computer and spend another hour cleaning it from all kind of Ophiuchus trojans and spyware, before erasing him of your AIM list. You do not want this guy to get in contact with you again. And from this moment, you will sleep with doors closed and locked.

It is now almost dawn. You must find your server and start the game now.

You plan to choose MP as your Server Player. He can't be worse than Ophiuchus, can he?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed113.png[/img]

Why do you need to do this.

You have better friends, and you still know a lot of contacts on your other chat programs. If you wait longer, you could have Tozy or Batori, the so-called "Raynbow Drynker", as your Server Player. You could even convince Via to do it, with a little help from Wey. In order to get your auspistice's help, you could pretend she is heading towards the black quadrant these days.

But actually, you cannot wait any longer. You need something really refreshing. Especially since this last conversation. You need to launch the game.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed114.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed123.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed124.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed125.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed126.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed127.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed128.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed129.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed130.png[/img]

You fail miserably.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed131.png[/img]

This little wriggler stands in his respiteblock. It just so happens that today, he must walk through the entire antediluvian Orpiment Boron Sensitive Complex of Extraction, Nursery and Education in order to recover a new copy of a disturbing underground game from the claws of an albino mutualistic sky predator.

But only the omniscient narration knows of this appellation. The name of this place is lost to the entire troll civilization since millennia, for this is the strange and deserted legacy of one of many apostate governments this planet knew. The Troll Steward of these days doubted the ancient troll ways, and, like some other twisted and insane planetary intendants before and after her reign, ordered to build myriads of absurd buildings. The Nursery is one of these evidences of past madness.

This gigantic and tremendous group of buildings, sealed off with spiked gates, crowned with devastating defenses, threaded with many deadly traps in order to protect the brood, and later broken, cracked, eroded, penetrated by the most incongrous and dangerous vegetation, vastly swamped by dark waters and the many fluids and effluvium of long-dead larval pods and wrigglers' recuperacoons, has been the theater of a gargantuan number of historic battles and tragedies. 

So this little wriggler usually stays in his self-chosen respiteblock.

What will the name of this little wriggler be?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed132.gif[/img]

No, that's not it.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed133.png[/img]

That doesn't even fit in the name field!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed134.png[/img]

Truly sorry, but those suggestions do not have the right number of letters.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed135.png[/img]

Stop. We get it now.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed136.png[/img]

How did you guess his most common nickname?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed137.png[/img]

Anyway, you will not get to name this young troll because he is too young to remember his name.

Or possibly because he is already a grown-up troll pretending to be a very young kid, just a few weeks older than his wriggling day. But it is clearly the most foolish idea, and the narration will not dare insult our so cute friend with such blatant lies in this second chapter.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed138.png[/img]

Your name is GINNEO ADARNA.

Being EXTREMELY YOUNG AND JUVENILE, you have not so many INTERESTS. But thanks to also being a LITTLE GENIUS GRUB, you still have more than many grubs.

You are part of the GRUBBYFUR subculture. Even on Alternia, this kind of deviancy is not extremely popular, and people mock you most of the time. You don't care, for you are very BRAVE and NICE, but you still cry a little. You have a lot of friends able to consolate you, even if you never meet any of them. Unlike your friend Vanny, you are a pretty SHY, LONELY and ISOLATED troll.

You appreciate all things children are fond of: COLORFUL TV SHOWS and WEBSERIES, CARTOONS, CHALLENGING TRIALS, candy-flavoured scarabs and other SWEETS.

You like magical animals, especially UNICORNS, a mythical category of musclebeasts. Most people think they never existed. But you know better, since you are secretly a MAGICAL UNIGONRUB, a Unicorn/Dragon/Grub hybrid, and THE LAST OF YOUR KIND.

Your trolltag is [color=#03B2CD]magicalPaws[/color] and [color=#03B2CD]you have diffiguldies of speak begaugause you are still a gugute liddle grub ! ^o^[/color]

p.c: Ginneo: Examine Lusus which is definitely the least horrible thing in this room.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed139.png[/img]

Of course !

This is Goldie, your hedgechick lusus. He is the best friend you have, even if like all custodians, he can't speak! He is strict yet playful with you, like all good parents are.

It is because you ordered him to do so, some sweeps ago, when you found your way of life. Since neither the Imperial Drone nor the army has struck at your door yet, your relationship is not going to turn into mature association. For Goldie, complying with your ideas was the best way to ensure tolerable cohabitation. You made it pretty clear you were going to do all kinds of evil things, like bad wrigglers are, if he wasn't behaving like a good custodian for a kid your age!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed140.png[/img]

Sometimes, a bad person threatens to report you to Symbiotic Parent Abuse, but they never do.

It's because everything always ends well and persons who love each other as you do are not going to get separated.

p.c: Ginneo: Wriggle about cutely and play with your lusus.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed141.gif[/img]

The reader blissfully didn't know some babies get pleasure from knocking their own head.

Until now.

p.c: Reader: Attempt to be Ophiuchus the Great.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed141.png[/img]

You can't be Ophiuchus the Great because Ophiuchus the Great is currently busy dressing his Nepeta doll!

p.c: Why does that teal plushie have Vamuin's horn pattern?
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed142.png[/img]

It's Fanny! It's your PLUSH FRIEND!

You plan to do life-size plushies of all your friends, but for now you have only three: FANNY, REN-REN and SECCY. But it's alright, because they are THE PERSONS YOU FEEL REALLY CLOSE TO!

You play and sleep with them all the time.

p.c: Ginneo: Please tell us you didn't snap your own horns off, tie one to a string and wear it as a headband.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed143.png[/img]

Of course it is not one of your severed horns! This would be a most dreadful and disturbing idea!

This horn is a gift from a mercantile black mage/magical black merchant/black market magician/maybe another word, a FRIEND who wanted to help you to REVEAL YOUR TRUE NATURE. You practically got it for free.

You are pretty sure you never had horns besides your magical UNIGONRUB HORN!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed144.png[/img]

This is Big Daddy, your beaverbear-shaped simplified computer device! The keys are larger because you are just a little kid, and you don't have a lot of programs on it. You also cannot connect a lot of things besides your modem pod. But it's very user-friendly, as are all products of eekMak label.

When you want to do something, you just have to pounce on Big Daddy's lap and play with the tools!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed145.png[/img]

Since the last conversation with Fanny, your computer is now in SLEEP MODE and you don't want to wake him up.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed146.png[/img]

Letting Big Daddy sleep is alright, because you can still access to your Honeycomb friend list and to your Truncare navigator using the removable paw!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed147.png[/img]

You captchalogue your cellarva using BABY'S FIRST MODUS. This inventory system is very comfortable and secure, but you can't take more than six items at the same time with you!

p.c: Ginneo: Go through the complex complex using genius grub know-how.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed148.png[/img]

That's right! It's time to help Fanny. You quickly cut to the game and enter EXTRACUT(E) MODE.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed149.png[/img]

You quickly reach the next room. You are now in another stocking area of the currently-extremely-unrecognizable KITCHEN AREA OF PAST TIMES.

You see two doors in front of you.

Firstly, a door which opened on the FORBIDDEN ZONE, an entirely inhospitable part of the ruins, flooded and full of old slime (and other toxic fluids) vapors. You BARRICADED it, but you DIDN'T DO A VERY GOOD WORK ON IT.

Secondly, a door opening on the CIRCUIT. Your lusus knows you like trials and he organizes obstacles courses because he wants to keep you amused and in good physical shape. It is the shortest and most secure way to the COURTYARD where VICTORY will land.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed150.png[/img]

It's your fan! You always were kind of a fanboy, because it is so great to feel the wind on your skin all night. It gets to you every time.

Plus it dispels the poisonous vapors when they manage to reach your place. With such defense, you can't possibly be intoxicated!

p.c: Ginneo: Make sure your Strife Specibus is properly allocated before going through the Circuit.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed151.png[/img]

You don't have to worry.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed152.png[/img]

You can already hear your enemies cowering in fear.

p.c: Ginneo: Hurry to the meeting point.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed153.png[/img]

Your lusus has once again modified the Enigma Door. You will need to find the answer to a MACHIAVELLIAN RIDDLE if you want to continue.

[i]What goes on six legs at dusk, on two legs at midnight, and on none at dawn?[/i]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed154.png[/img]

The TROLL! 

Firstly he is a cute little larva, so he goes on six cute little legs. Then he reaches his bipedal form. And finally, if he is still alive after an entire existence of war, the old troll has the honor of being dismembered and eviscerated alive during the FAREWELL RITUAL.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed155.png[/img]

The ENIGMA DOOR opens! You are so excited you can barely contain yourself.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed156.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed157.gif[/img]

You are now once again VAMUIN IKENGA for a short but determining moment.

You will turn this Kernelsprite into the most badass sprite possible. You thought about offering the honor to be your most efficient sidekick to Victory, but he is away, so you will have to relay on ordinary items for now.

You have a large choice of items to sacrifice.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed161.png[/img]

Sometimes, you cannot believe what foolish ideas go through your head. You hate tentacles. You will never prototype anything even remotely similar to tentacles and will personally reset the game if you see the very shadow of one snake-shaped appendage.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed162.png[/img]

When you think about it, it is exactly the kind of stupid thing Ginneo would do.

You will need a strong-willed Server Player to keep an eye on the "kid" if you don't want to end with the most horrible prototypings.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed158.gif[/img]

You start nicely enough by throwing your most beloved sports box in the game construct.

p.c: Vamuin: Prototype PAILFUL HUNKS & BUCKET GIRLS.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed159.png[/img]

Then you say goodbye to your favorite magazine.

No one will say you are not ready for the most terrible sacrifices to reach victory.

p.c: Vamuin: Prototype ONE-WINGED, PRECISELY-COOKED DOUBLE-HEADED KILLER WHALE.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed160.png[/img]

Finally, it's time for the big whale.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed161.gif[/img]

Suspense is unbearable.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed163.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed164.gif[/img]

It is suddenly time to talk about more interesting events.

You are now Ginneo and you are in the dolls room!

You can reach two new doors after the next threshold. The first door has a spiral carved on it, the second one a subjuggulating face and the third one an egg.
-empty page-

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed168.png[/img]

Of course! Powerful clown, not in the room, grasp on the real world, mortal enemy of Famine... We are talking about RONHLD MK DUNALD!

You are now in the sad lollipops room! These sweets don't like to be sucked, but you can't help yourself around them!

There is no riddle here, just a choice. Goldie has likely once again played with the old automatic lock system, just like he played with the door riddles. You will be unable to turn back and choose another door if you go through any threshold.

The first door has a spiral carved on it, the second one a subjuggulating face and the third one an egg.

p.c: Ginneo: Go for the spiral door.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed169.png[/img]

This is your old room, back when your symbol wasn't the half-broken egg.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed170.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed171.png[/img]

You are now Past Ginneo.

p.c: Past Ginneo: Comment on how comfortable wearing metal pants and a metal shirt are.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed172.png[/img]

You are not wearing this much metal! Okay, you may have zippers, rivets and nails all over your multiple sets of clothes, and even a reinforced ALTERNIAN WAR UNIFORM in your wardrobe, but you like to keep your speed EFFICIENT and your moves FREE. These squares are thin zipper pockets for all kinds of items, constituting a smart and convenient physical add-on to your BLACK SOUL MODUS.

Nonetheless, you indeed love metal, and all kinds of VIOLENT MUSIC.

p.c: Past Ginneo: Reveal why you have multiple chairs despite no one ever visiting you.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed173.png[/img]

Lies. Individuals and entire groups regularly visit you.

You never had friends. A good troll doesn't catch or propagate the disease called friendship. But you have ACQUAINTANCES, carefully selected cold and reasonable grown-ups for INFORMATION EXCHANGE, OFFICIALISM MANIPULATION in order to get people you don't like culled, and HARD TRAINING for martial efficiency and quick climbing of the military ladder. Together, you swore to be ready whenever the imperial army comes to recruit you.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed174.png[/img]

You regularly invites MANY OTHER PEOPLE too. These idiots don't even know about your gang, but CAN BE USEFUL IN OTHER WAYS. Like this masheup girl who knows a lot.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed175.png[/img]

Later, you will find YOUR WAY OF LIFE.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed176.png[/img]

And all of these contacts will strangely cease to visit.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed183.png[/img]

The plasma monitor, regularly fueled with blood from the lowest castes, isn't the product of breeding and genetical engineering like most of troll technology, but rather an ingenious biomechanical recycling of a skull. This isn't a mere visual display, this also constitues the system unit. It was the head of a lusus from the colossus species, but now, the bone part is called "enclosure", and the brain "central processing unit".

Your computer is linked to a quite ordinary modem and an antispiral keyboard. But the important part is the scratching board. Like the monitor, it works with low blood, and it represents the state of the art in LeMarchand Lament mouse technology. It allows you to react with painful accuracy when you play any retro FPS.

After a night of furious gaming, you must wait for the skin area to regrow, but the perfection is worth it.

p.c: Past Ginneo: Why are you living in some abandoned social experiment instead of a real hive?
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed177.png[/img]

You always INHABIT RUINS. They are sinister and deserted, worthy of your dark personality. You feed on the quiet, silent atmosphere.

You found this particularly old, weird and disturbing building, and you immediatly loved it.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed178.png[/img]

But some ruins contain their proper, unusual dangers.

Toxic fumes reached you.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed179.png[/img]

Despite the fans you installed everywhere, you changed.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed180.png[/img]

Slowly.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed181.png[/img]

Insidiously.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed182.png[/img]

You never knew what was happening to you.

p.c: Ginneo: Snap out of it! Fanny is counting on you. You don't want to let him down!
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed184.png[/img]

That's right! You are a good grub! You want to help! Time to get EXTRACUTE again!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed185.png[/img]

Just like you thought, the door to the junction room locked itself behind you.

You have no choice but to use the other exit, leading right to another junction room. 

Long-broken NURSE DRONES are splattered everywhere. All of them are concentrated in a few junction rooms all accross the complex. You are just a little grub so you don't know why!

It probably has something to do with their Artificial Stupidity, though. Like CULLING OF THE WEAK and MOVIE-SHOOTING ABOARD SPACESHIPS, OUT-OF-DATE ROBOT FACTORIES are a multiple-millenia tradition. The same plants produce dysfunctional machines again and again. Why would one change a winning formula?

Anyway, you find a MAP!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed186.png[/img]

It is your very own map! You drew it when you were slightly older, so it is at least understandable... uum... you mean... You drew it younger, but you felt particularly a genius grub this day! So it is very clear! Yes! It is as clear as every map should be!

[b][url=./assets/img/special/ginneomaphumantranslation.png]FULL-SIZE TRANSLATED MAP[/url][/b]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed187.png[/img]

You find yourself in a long corridor. You gambol naively when suddenly, you notice a number on the next door!

You stop right here! You know what this number means, it means GOLDIE has TRAPPED the entire room! He loves to do this when he prepares a Circuit for you. You remember with kindness and cries of joy the DINING ROOM WITH A THOUSAND DEATHTRAPS.

Seems like this time, he got lazy. The 5 indicates how many traps you have to find. If you want to reach the next room without being caught by his innocent tricks, you need to spot all of them! But you'll look for an extra one too, since Goldie is a prankster! Sometimes he adds one EXTRA SURPRISE to the game!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed188.png[/img]

You spot all of the friendly traps without any difficulty!

[spoiler open="Open list of lethal wonders" close="Close list of lethal wonders"]- The threshecutioner armor rigged in order to cut,
- The tricked archeradicator painting,
- The calibrated chandelier,
- The crumbling column,
- The cracked ceiling,
- The poorly-hidden trap door under the carpet,
- The catapult toy,
- The well-hidden crossbow with six poisonous quarrels.[/spoiler]

This time, there were three EXTRA SURPRISES. Goldie is such a joker!

You reach the next room in no time because you're a happily agile little grub!

Besides the good surprise to find one of your FRIENDS here, seems this room has an extra exit! It could be reached by an adult, but it's way too high for a wriggler.

Also your Honeycomb application is ringing!

p.c: Well better go ahead and answer it then.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed189.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed190.png[/img]

Looks like you got pestered for a while and Honeycomb dysfunctioned again, not indicating you had new messages.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed191.png[/img]

When an human child starts to disembark on the vast and mysterious beaches of adolescence comes a day feared by both kid and parent.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed193.png[/img]

It's the time of the Talk, when the marvels of life are finally revealed without any lie.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed194.png[/img]

Some children may already have a good idea about what their parents are awkwardly trying to explain.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed195.png[/img]

While others may never get a clue.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed196.png[/img]

For trolls, things are slightly different.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed197.png[/img]

The Carve is more perceived like the last of their deadly trials.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed198.png[/img]

All of custodians are mute. Therefore, the kids have to sit down and wait for their lusus to get graphical.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed199.png[/img]

And while some of them are vague and indecipherable in their explanations...

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed200.png[/img]

... others may get horribly exhaustive and detailed with their depictions.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed201.png[/img]

[i]I met a traveller from an antique land
Who said: "Two vast and trunkless legs of stone
Stand in the desert. Near them, on the sand,
Half sunk, a shattered visage lies, whose frown,
And wrinkled lip, and sneer of cold command,
Tell that its sculptor well those passions read
Which yet survive, stamped on these lifeless things.
The hand that mocked them, and the heart that fed.
And on the pedestal these words appear:
'My name is Ozymandias, King of Kings:
Look on my works, ye mighty, and despair!'
Nothing beside remains. Round the decay
Of that colossal wreck, boundless and bare
The lone and level sands stretch far away.[/i]

p.c: Ginneo: Stack the blocks up so you can exit through that vent thing.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed214.png[/img]

You put the PUPPET away and starts playing with cubes. Your cute little building is ready in no time. You really want to reach this hole, since this is going to economize you two full rooms, and more important, three phixed doors...

But you are so tiny! This isn't going to work!

If only you had some convenient and thematic-related element in order to put the shortcut to good use!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed215.png[/img]

You can't do the Windy Thing because wind is not your thing! According to the GAME DATA Fanny sent you, you are not the HEIR OF BREATH. And even if you were, with the language level thing, you think it would be more amongst the lines of LEGATEE OF INTIMATION.

... What are you talking about? You are just a little grub. You don't know of any compiltaced word yet!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed216.png[/img]

This is one of your best fans. It never disappoints you.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed217.png[/img]

You always get off... the ground!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed218.png[/img]

Weeeeeeeee!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed219.png[/img]

You are now [url=./assets/img/special/ginneomapalmostcomplete.png]really advancing[/url].

There isn't any fan in this room. In fact, there's not much except for some thin fissures filling the room with WHITE MIST.

There is a variety of vapors permeating the whole Orpiment Boron Sensitive Complex of Extraction, Nursery and Education, since there is not only RECUPERACOONS down there, but also LARVAL PODS and VARIOUS MEDS, all of this slowly putrefying since millenia. Sopor-filled cocoons are especially slow to decompose, because they are biotechnological products conceived for permanence. In addition, slime itself possesses conservative qualities not unlike those of formaldehyde.

Consequently, vapors come in every flavour, and some of them are even invisible. WHITE MIST is especially soft and sugary.

The next PHIXED RIDDLE is:

[i]I have my twin in the dark sky, but he's girly, I don't like him, he has a child but so tiny. Which one of us is relating to the rainbow tone I'm talking in?[/i]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed220.png[/img]

The right answer is obviously the green moon. In the riddle's terms: "[i]Me[/i]". Only two cubes to move, that's a nice change of pace!

You also extinct the fire. You feel excited. It's the first time Goldie is using a BOMB. And the timing was so good! He had to lighten it up a few minutes before you reach the room. He is clearly moving, using his science of these ancient doors in order to follow you without being caught. You wonder if it means he'll be CHASING you? Hide-and-seek is so fun!

He should stop with explosives, though. These old ruins are so fragile. You preferred when he was using a lot of kitchen tools.

There is nothing interesting in this room besides an ENORMOUS HIGH-POWERED FLASHLIGHT. Like most trolls, you have fairly good nocturne vision, plus it's waaaay too heavy for Baby's First Modus. Too bad, because it's pretty!

You immediatly use the fan and reach the next room.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed221.png[/img]

It's the final room of the circuit!

This place is filled with the WHITE MIST permeating all of the fissures in the Complex.

There is a letter glued to the wall.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed222.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"][color=#F75D59][i][left]Gin, I am so proud. It is the end of today's Circuit. In the next room, you will find a surprise. A real present of me, one thing I wanted to give you since a long time ago. With my very wing. We had hard times, but today, I feel happy.

Have a last riddle, some kind of charade.

My first one is me, it's you, it's everyone.
My second one wants to be with you.
My third one is dead or alive.
My fourth one isn't one, it is two.
I always wear my fifth one.
My sixth one isn't me,
And my last one is still doing science.
My whole is my beloved wish.

The answer will, like usual, open the door.


Your friend to the end,

[u]Go-1-die[/u].[/left][/i][/color][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed223.png[/img]

It's only logical!

[spoiler open="Find the answer" close="Forget the answer nononono"][color=#F75D59][i][left]I always wanted to skin you alive.[/left][/i][/color][/spoiler]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed224.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed225.png[/img]

Hehehe... Goldie can be such a joker!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed226.png[/img]

Alas, you noticed neither the meaningful number [color=#F75D59][i]1[/i][/color] in the signature nor said meaning, aka the well-rigged chandelier.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed227.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed228.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open AIM-log" close="Close AIM-log"]-- [color=#045FB4]righteousPornstar [RP][/color] began trolling [color=#03B2CD]magicalPaws [MP][/color] --

[left][color=#045FB4]RP: C==) Dude
RP: C==) It's happening, dude.
RP: C==) Fuck it, I'm breaking this Cruxite thing 
RP: C==) Even if Dred wants me to° call it an Imperassentia So°mething
RP: C==) Whatever anyway breaking the Entry Shit
RP: C==) It do°esn't even lo°o°k like me anyway
RP: C==) O°kay baby, I ho°pe yo°u're ready, I'm jumping in the game!
RP: C==) Shit is go°nna explo°de![/color][/left][/spoiler]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed229.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed230.png[/img]

Okay. This trap was a little too well-calibrated.

And now the paw is broken. Father Bear is mutilated and you don't have any way to communicate anymore!

Maybe you have been a little too annoying in the past week. Maybe Goldie is through with you. Maybe you're actually in danger!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed231.png[/img]

You hastily insert the cubes where they belong and the phixed door opens.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed232.png[/img]

The mist is unbearable! You hope it won't have any bad mental effect!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed233.png[/img]

In the last room, you cannot see anything. But there is a strange sound coming from the corner. A low-pitched humming or growling.

And another one behind you. A screech.

p.c: Ginneo: Let your instincts carry you.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed234.png[/img]

Your instincts are telling you to get the fuck out of here.

p.c: Ginneo: Calm yourself down and make as little noise as possible. Focus all your thoughts on interpreting the various sensory data.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed235.png[/img]

There are fragrances of blood and meat. There is subtle, light, sweaty fear. And there is rage, a lot of it. You already know the general smell, but there is something different from the hedgechick you know. Maybe the mist is already playing with your senses.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed236.png[/img]

There is an almost-silent, powerful, murderous motion right to the left.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed237.png[/img]

p.c: Ginneo: Experience a rush of metalvana from the sheer adrenaline.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed238.png[/img]

You're touching heavy metal nirvana! A strength you didn't know you possessed is running through your entire musculature.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed239.png[/img]

You land perfectly. But the ground is crackling. It must be especially dangerous at this very point.

p.c: Ginneo: Move in for a closer look, but be prepared to grub roll to dodge its next attack.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed240.png[/img]

While you are approaching, you cannot understand what this thing is. It's huge for sure, but it appears to be still growing, more with every second. Maybe you're hallucinating.

You can only guess it must be especially powerful, because it lifts its blade again before you can get a really close look.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed241.png[/img]

You cannot do that because there is no such thing as Second Strife Specibus!

You always had this Rattlekind Specibus. You are still very young, but you never heard of any way to change Specibus. Even your battle trance cannot help. Seriously, who ever heard of a world where you can use more than one category of weapon? It doesn't make any sense!

You have forgotten the real reason why you originally chose this Abstratus, too. Way before it inspirated your decay, in combination with the Nursery environment and your lusus' neotenic looks.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed242.png[/img]

It's because you liked to humiliate enemies.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed248.png[/img]

You are starting to feel really disturbed. You wonder if you're really fighting Goldie here. Or some other thing. Can you trust your senses?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed249.png[/img]

To hell with it. You are attacked. You will answer.

p.c: Ginneo: Toss rattle at it with all your might.
p.b: [img]./assets/img/story/doomed245.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed246.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed247.png[/img]

Alas, the adversary seems fully ready for your offensive. So there's a good chance the crackling sound wasn't his skull! Your toy has released its last rattle.

You put some distance between you and him to avoid smashing and crushing. Getting close to these feet doesn't seem the brightest idea.

Is that you or is this thing getting bigger and bigger every second?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed248.png[/img]

You are starting to feel really disturbed. You wonder if you're really fighting Goldie here. Or some other thing. Can you trust your senses?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed249.png[/img]

To hell with it. You are attacked. You will answer.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed250.png[/img]

You hear your weapon break against the creature.

You still have a rattle. A tougher one. You can crush wood with this.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed251.png[/img]

And you are a courageous little grub!

p.c: Ginneo: While the blade is still touching the ground, sprint up the back of it.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed252.png[/img]

You are a courageous [i]genius[/i] grub!
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed253.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed254.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed255.png[/img]

p.c: Ginneo: Shake it, shake it, baby!
p.b: [img]./assets/img/story/doomed256.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed257.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed258.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed259.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed260.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed261.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed262.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed263.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed264.png[/img]

p.c: Ginneo: Run, run for your cucute life! You're too young to die!
p.b: [img]./assets/img/story/doomed265.png[/img]

p.c: Ginneo: Recall where the floor had been previously cracked.
p.b: [img]./assets/img/story/doomed266.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed267.png[/img]

The thing doesn't seem to be heavy enough.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed268.png[/img]

But as soon as the gigantic knife weighs down the dangerous area further, the dice has been cast!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed269.png[/img]

You'd better not get too close.

What even made you think you could win? You're still a little wiggler. Short. Black hair. Just turned two sweeps last month.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed270.png[/img]

And suddenly you remember your responsibility! Fanny! Victory! You need to hurry. The Circuit is finished, the last rooms should be easy.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed271.png[/img]

After some search, the only exit seems to be this direction. And you don't like it. It's the direction the low-pitched humming came from.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed272.png[/img]

It must be behind the door.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed273.png[/img]

Another room flooded by white mist. You follow the humming. Or growling.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed274.png[/img]

What.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed275.png[/img]

This is an IMPERIAL DRONE. And an extremely damaged one.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed276.png[/img]

It's not supposed to happen. Drones are conceived to eliminate young trolls if necessary (and some categories are even programmed to annihilate adults trespassing). That is not an easy task, and you have never heard of anyone defeating an Imperial model!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed277.png[/img]

You are a genius little grub, and therefore examine the liquid.

The robotic blood is still fresh. This drone has been broken recently.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed278.png[/img]

That's impossible. One doesn't fuck with drones.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed279.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed280.png[/img]
 
Or maybe one does.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed281.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed282.png[/img]

You don't want to fill your diapers anymore.

And even more surprising, you don't want to be caught. 

You need to reach Victory. Now.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed283.png[/img]

Wait!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed284.png[/img]

This is the origin of the humming noise.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed285.png[/img]

What's that? Huh? Radio?

What's going on with that radio ?
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed286.png[/img]

[spoiler open="OPEN TECHNICAL DETAILS" close="CLOSE TECHNICAL DETAILS"]Silent Hive is a 2011 Alabaster game which became lost media then got salvaged by Snake, Skye and Steelo.

- The loading bars may lag at first but the loading process works.
- On some browsers the game may be slower. You can try it through different interfaces for better results, Google Chrome is generally better.[/spoiler]

You... you surely hope so!

No, no, it's finished. It isn't a bad dream this time. You really have Fanny's hard drive between your little hands. Now you can play the game!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed292.png[/img]

And Victory is so happy to meet you! You love animals. They are always so soft and cute and nice!

p.c: Be the one who first revealed the existence and importance of the Main Twelve.
p.b:
[censored]

You really don't want to try to be Ophiuchus again. Especially right now.

p.c: Be the one who first revealed the existence and importance of the Main Twelve.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed315.png[/img]

You really don't want to try to be Ophiuchus again.

But it was him. He first hacked some files of apocalypseArisen and quickly understood something great was going on.

After extensive research, he discovered the truth. Which he only trusted two girls with.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed316.png[/img]

Clearly the twelve kids were the reincarnation of both the Blind prophets and multiple legendary Troll Empresses, merged into one single entity then separated into twelve bodies at birth. When they would be reunited, all Twelvies into the same place, they would be able to establish a mighty hivemind, and, finally fused, to save the world.

Their quest would be hard and long, and include finding their totem selves and transfigurating the Deathstream, Alternia's magical consciousness. But no need to worry, for the missing link had found them. That was him, Ophiuchus, the last piece of the puzzle, and when the time would be ready, he would reveal himself to them and merge with them.

For now, the Main Twelve needed to discover their true feelings for each other.

[censored]

For now, the Main Twelve needed to discover their true feelings for each other.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed318.png[/img]

You can't be Past Batori because the story is already convoluted enough.

Besides, Past Batori was clearly not doing anything interesting.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed319.png[/img]

You can't be morbiusStrip because morbiusStrip is too busy being a horrible misogynist!

Also, wow, his Comics Mode is elegant for sure!

p.c: Be a troll who isn't going to get his/her dumb ass killed by meteors and/or G'lyb-Goly'b.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed320.png[/img]

That could be anyone!

All these characters have so much more... [i]interesting[/i] deaths in store.

p.c: Be the one who genuinely doesn't deserve to go through the terrible events that will occur.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed321.png[/img]

Alas, they are numerous.

It's hard to choose between all these innocent souls.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed322.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed323.png[/img]

You cannot be Sectra because Sectra is currently spying on a Twelvie with her binoculars!
Also, it is not polite to call someone by their name before having been properly introduced!

p.c: Be that crazy chick who pretends to be about twelve different people.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed324.png[/img]

How convenient. She is actually in the next bush spying on Sectra!

And you cannot be Copycat because... Well, to be honest, she isn't a SGRUBrip Player, like most of the characters selected, and therefore isn't a playable character.

Too bad, because she is bored and annoyed like hell right now, and could use some action.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed325.png[/img]

You know what, let's throw gameplay mechanics in the trashcan for a while. She is really bored and will likely become crazy if she doesn't do anything.

You are now Copycat.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed326.png[/img]

You can do nothing of the sort!

The catgirl is one of the hardest Twelvies for you to take free, deep and extremely original and personal inspiration from, and one thing you never got right was the good way to joyfully jump on people. You take pride to being able to mimic... err... to integrate successfully any benevolent influence, but your diversified talents actually only extent to behaviours not too alien for you. Maybe your talents are not so diversified after all.

You're bad at pouncing. You're bad at hugging. You're even bad at shaking hands. You guess you could equally be bad at kissing if you had ever kissed anybody.

You are just not at ease with body language.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed327.png[/img]

Let's add if jumping on someone at the edge of a cliff may seem like a good idea to innocent souls, scientific studies and statistics have proved that individuals prone to this kind of behaviour tend to die extremely young.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed328.png[/img]

You can't do that, because you don't know how Lord Ampora seduces people. He lives somewhere in the middle of the sea, and since you have neither an aquatic custodian nor a flying one, it is especially hard to gather good data about him. The other sea dweller Twelvie is hard to spy on too, but at least she is quite sociable, and even incredibly approachable taking into account she is the Heir Apparent.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed329.png[/img]

Eridan is different. He doesn't talk so much to people, he is known to be extremely dangerous, even by troll standards, and rumors indicate he regularly acquires mystical wands and more mundane deadly tools. He seems to be well-versed in the dark arts, and overall a stunning example of mighty, highly trained, intellectually gifted, cultivated in the most esoteric ways sea dweller. And of course he has a flying lusus and an extraordinary weapon. You can't bring yourself to aknowledge he's three sweeps younger than you.

He is so mysterious.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed330.png[/img]

Besides, according to your careful surveillance and deduction work, he doesn't need to "hit on" anyone. Every clue denotes all of his quadrants are gloriously filled since sweeps.

p.c: Copycat: Flashback to you and Sectra/your mimicry's history.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed331.png[/img]

You both grew in the same village. You got along really well. And progressively, you started to feel something more than the troll disease called friendship towards your childhood friend.

p.c: Exposit on how you made the acquaintance of a being as vile as Ophiuchus the Great.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed332.png[/img]

Some day, a really strange man started contacting you. He was looking for assistants. He wanted to gather information about a dozen of kids. This seemed quite uncanny to both of you, but he started demonstrating you his hacking skills, capacities so great they seemed out of this world.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed333.png[/img]

He offered you free computer services in exchange of some photos of the Main Twelve's hives. Bonus point if you managed to steal and to send him any kind of mundane items they may be using. Extra extra points for handkerchiefs they had been filling or slime they had been sleeping in.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed334.png[/img]

You always were too shy to make your move with Sectra.

And when she started to get obsessed with Twelvies, you saw your chance to become noticeable.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed335.png[/img]

It was a mistake.

p.c: Copycat: Produce your own binoculars to spy on Sectra.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed336.png[/img]

You don't own binoculars. You don't do that kind of thing anymore. The Triple-Blood Prince barely asks any material from you two anymore. The reason Sectra is still stalking the Main Twelve is because she came to actually like this shit. You are not such a fool.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed337.png[/img]

But someone else has binoculars. And uses them to spy on [i]you[/i].

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed338.png[/img]

If only because it makes the situation even more ridiculous.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed339.png[/img]

This you can do.

You tell Sectra to advance or abscond.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed340.png[/img]

She tells you she won't advance. She's not ready to require Vriska's advice yet.

What a fool.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed341.png[/img]

Vriska's relationship wisdom is renowned.

Everyone knows she managed to land the best matesprit and the best kismesis.

p.c: Copycat: Express your flushed feelings in a manner both awkward and pitiful.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed342.png[/img]

You tell her you really really love her and you don't want her to get in any trouble.

p.c: Let us learn which kind of troll Sectra really is from the inside.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed343.png[/img]

A kinda oblivious one.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed344.png[/img]

She hugs you, tells you she loves you too, and gets back to stalking.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed345.gif[/img]

Looks like you're not switching quadrants anytime s...

What the hell is going on?
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed346.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed347.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed348.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed349.gif[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed350.png[/img]

p.c: Sectra & Copycat: Say goodbye to Spidermom since there no way she can survive this.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed351.png[/img]

Sectra asks if it is for real, if Vriska's lusus is about to die.

You tell her you were too busy contemplating the utter destruction of Equius' hive. 

You think you heard a scream or something.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed352.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed353.png[/img]

LOOK OUT!
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed354.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed355.png[/img]

p.c: Ophiuchus: Use the surprise to seize unsuspecting future captives.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed356.png[/img]

The girls are no longer useful to you the way they used to be, you have gathered all the data you needed.

But you could use a couple of new interprets for some Gamzee X Kanaya shipping. The last two guests who heartily agreed to serve as the mystical avatars for these Chosen One are currently unavailable for reasons no one should ever ask about.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed357.png[/img]

But with your mighty horns horribly weighing down and restricting your every move, and your clockwork-powered casters, you are not nearly quick as you need to be to catch them directly. Not to mention the noise of the toy-key would alert your prey.

This is the point where the hypodermic rifle comes in handy.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed358.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed359.png[/img]

Nope. Your senses are not the most sharpened, I'm afraid.

You examine Sectra. Apparently, she's alive. And not badly hurt.

However, she needs you right now. Spidermom and Equius' house can go to hell. You wouldn't leave her side for a thousand stupid kids and their bloodthirsty giant lusii.

p.c: Dart: Bounce off of random metal plate that Copycat has under her coat for mimicry reasons.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed360.png[/img]

Dammit.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed361.png[/img]

DAMMIT!
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed362.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed363.png[/img]

Why, Sectra. How magnificent you manage to be even in the most violently induced of sleep. What can be your dreams behind this most elegant facade? Would a kiss of love save you from Troll Morpheus' arms?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed364.png[/img]

And just what do you think YOU'RE winking at??? Keep your cold, mechanical judgment to yourself.

Oh, what's that? My, that is a smart mouth you have.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed365.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed366.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed367.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed368.png[/img]

p.c: >Copycat: React to your former employer Subjugglator-style.
p.b: [img]./assets/img/story/doomed369.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed370.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed371.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed372.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed373.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed374.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed375.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed376.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed378.png[/img]

The hypodermic rifle happens to be an Antone Chekov[imgs]./assets/img/special/trademark.png[/imgs], and therefore, regardless of its previous mutilation, it is flawlessly triggered by the tremor.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed379.gif[/img]

In a similarly efficient fashion, as a shameful copy/pasta of a canon panel, you don't fail to enter.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed380.png[/img]

Encouraged by the two previous successes, you don't fail to fail to dodge. This is helped by the fact that you are neither sentient nor mobile.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed381.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed382.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed383.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed384.png[/img]

Well, it was... not a very intellectually inspiring scene.

Let's just hope Ophiuchus won't be the first to wake up and leave the Amazing Stalker Trio to their vaudeville, shall we? They are clearly taking their role as gag characters a little too literally.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed385.png[/img]

You can't be someone serious because she is being too serious at this instant. She is too dark for you. You wouldn't understand.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed386.png[/img]

You can't be Victory because the griffin was instructed to stay in the courtyard of the Complex. Vamuin has already been sent in the Medium, and the only means by which to join him again is to be raptured with the hive of another Player.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed387.png[/img]

You can't be Goldie because after sweeps of intoxication, he is really too fucknuts to be a playable character anymore. Yep, even crazier than his master. One cannot fathom the abyss which is this lusus' soul.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed388.png[/img]

But if you were Goldie, you would be rejoicing. 

Once again, your little master is all alone in the Complex. Without any weapon.


You are slowly following him.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed389.png[/img]

This time, you will get him for good.

p.c: Be the titanic asshole. For like, two minutes.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed390.png[/img]

What? But we're about to finally find the chapter character!

And for two minutes? Seriously?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed391.png[/img]

Okay, if you want the titanic asshole so badly, I guess you can have him.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed392.png[/img]

Let's say precisely 2:22 minutes.

That's a more elegant number.
