Wait...

Wrong time.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1400b.png[/img]

This one scene happened [i]centuries[/i] ago.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1401.png[/img]

This narration needs some calibration.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1402.png[/img]

Here we go. Right time, right place.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1403.png[/img]

In a hive shaped like a leaning ziggurat, located near the sea...
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1404.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1405.png[/img]

A troll of frail complexion stands in his heavily decorated respiteblock. Horns are everywhere. Literal horns. This individual is very delicate and does not accept facsimiles. He made sure every ornament inside and outside of his residence was made of authentic troll horn.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1406.png[/img]

Your name is RENART AZEBAN.

You are one of the few of your blood who have developed a FASCINATION WITH NOBILITY. You are supposedly THE LOWEST OF THE LOW, but you appreciate the traditional concept of aristocracy anyway, and you really wish you were born amongst the creditworthy rulers of this world.

In time, you came to believe in a CIRCULAR HEMOSPECTRUM, thus placing RED-blooded trolls like yourself as close to the IMPERIAL FUCHSIA as the SEA DWELLERS. Therefore, you only deign to speak with the most high-blooded trolls from your ideal: orange, red and violet. You can barely tolerate blue-blood and yellow-blood, and you cannot stand the lowest; the dirty, ugly and stupid green-blood. The Hemospectrum is really that important to you.

You developed a zeal for SILKEN CLOTHES and BRILLANT ORNAMENTS. Since you are of the LOWEST BLOOD, you don't own a lot of jewelry and you made all these necklaces, tiaras and various other items by yourself, USING TROLL HORNS. Even by Alternian standards, it is considered wrong in thousands of ways. But you find PRIDE in the fact you do not care about PREJUDICE.

Your trolltag is [color=#a10000]unsettlingMerchant[/color] and [color=#a10000]yôû tAlk în A vêry Ardênt And FlAMîng wAy, yôûr wôrds Arê sô pôîntêd thêy rêAlly sêêM tô bê ôn fîre.[/color]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1407.png[/img]

This is TROLL KUJA, one of your greatest rolemodels in life. He's so reflexive and distinguished.

It's a pity ANCESTORS are obviously a governmental conspiracy, because you would choose him as yours without a moment's hesitation. Ancient figures whose lives are linked to those of modern trolls, supposed to inspire them? What are the odds?

It's also a pity Troll Kuja couldn't be your Ancestor even if you believed in the whole Ancestor concept, because he's fictional.

p.c: Renart: Be rendered in a more appropriately symbolic manner.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1408.png[/img]

Aesthetic is everything. While entering your atelier, you really feel À LA MODE, as if you were ascending to a superior stage of perception and creation.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1409.png[/img]

"[i]Indifference[/i]". The horn pieces, meticulously carved to fit together without any kind of adhesive, interrelate into this paragon of elegance, pure expression of a vacuum, absence of passion.

Your [i]Wintry emotions[/i] sculpture series is amongst your finest works, but a quiet intuition leads you to think you could do even more exquisite in the near future. You have a vision of an immense, prodigious and sharpened masterpiece.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1410.png[/img]

This creation is less satisfying, but still pleasant to the eye. The raw material was an unwilling gift from your last visitor.

However, you don't have any use for a new doorknob. Inside your hive, you tend to prefer curtains to solid doors, if only because it allows Murdersity, your fox-raccoon lusus, to circulate in complete freedom.

That is typically the kind of product you sell to refined customers, though.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1411.png[/img]

You think you should really concentrate on the SGRUBrip game rather than on your business, right now. 

You see more and more meteors.

Time to contact various trolls.

p.c: Renart: Clean yourself up and let's get down to business.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1502.png[/img]

That's right. You cut the belt still tying you to a garderobe and remove all of your clothes.

You put the clothes to garbage. They touched this abominable, rough, oily skin. Apparently the guy was also having some disease.

You first energically rub your delicate body with a pumice and sanitary liquids you generally only use to clean up the raw material.

Then you take a long normal shower.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1503.png[/img]

You don't have the time to work on this prodigious amount of raw material right now. You'll just captchalogue them.

But in order to put it into your ETIQUETTE MODUS, you need to know the very quality of the horns. Your inventory system works by classifying the items according to their proper rank: the closer to the imperial shade, the higher.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1504.png[/img]

... these are not real horns. 

Just classic. You wouldn't believe how many trolls lie about the size of their horns these days.

This kind of fake horns is unusual, though. It's some stupid fiberplaz chassis. The structure is not even full; it contains absurd chains of clockwork mechanisms, linking the toy key in the corset to motorized casters.

It makes for an extremely stupid and dangerous vehicle, but the fake horn structure is thick and solid. Infinitely more solid, in fake, than real horns would be.

Interesting.

p.c: Batori: Be fascinated by your creation. So romantic yet tragic at the same time.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1542.png[/img]

Of course; you are completely enamoured of him right now.

... Maybe later. Right now, your magnificent champion is just becoming magnificently creepy. Plus the growing pain in your entire body is not making him any more sufferable.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1543.png[/img]


[left][color=#6C5926]- You look like you're afraid. I'm so very sorry. Would you understand if I said I was only a troll? You're too desireable for your own good.[/color][/left]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1544.png[/img]

p.c: Batori: Deal with this creep later, you gotta make out with the sexiest person in this game.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1545.png[/img]


[left][color=#868A08]- Get thee hence. Y have more ymportant matters to attend to than the lykes of thee, sv-vyftly ere yt ys too late.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1546.png[/img]


[left][color=#6C5926]- You're not good for me, Batori. I promise that this will be the last time you'll see me. I won't come back. I won't put you through anything like this again. You can go on with your life without any more interference from me. It will be as if I'd never existed. Don't worry. Your troll memory is nothing more than a sieve. Time heals all wounds for your kind. Well, I won't forget. But my kind is very easily distracted. You smell just exactly the same as always. So maybe this is hell. I don't care. I'll take it.[/color]
[color=#868A08]- Do v-vhat thou v-vylt; yt matters lyttle to me.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1547.png[/img]

What you are going to do will obstruct forever your path to godhood.

But you are running out of time. You feel like every bone in your body is broken, and you would have difficulties to breathe if you were a mere mortal.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1548.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1549.png[/img]

You are now quite unimpressively resurrected. You are just the same without the pain. Oh, and all of the stained glass cuts have disappeared as some bonus effect of the miraculous process. Sadly, your clothes stay ripped and soaked in your own blood.

Your uncanny pixelemental seems to have disappeared.

p.c: You're a rainbow drinker right? You can just lick yourself clean.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1550.png[/img]

You start using your tongue skillfully.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1551.png[/img]

It is not that efficient, but you stop more because you feel like somewhere, somehow, someone is getting off to this.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1552.png[/img]

You use your ONE-PERSON SPRAYING DEVICE, unaware than your friend the Artisan is also showering at the exact same moment.

Then you experiment a little with your THAUMIFICE SUBSTRATUM. Finally, you decide on an elegant candelabra/gown combination.

You also apply the usual ESOTERIC POTIONS to your perfect skin.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1553.png[/img]

You feel like something is missing. Something really important. But you cannot remember. What is so important?

Maybe allies?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1554.png[/img]

Almost none of them are online. And you feel as if you are in danger. What killed your body exactly? One minute, you were tormenting yourself over your grim fate and your lack of reflection, the next one, you were twisted in all ways imaginable and unimaginable.

You decide to report to your leader.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1555.png[/img]

p.c: Batori: Have you ever considered what running into someone like Troll Edward Cullen would be like in real life?
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1560.png[/img]

You are starting to realize.

Back when Edward's exquisite face first appeared in the phosphorescence of your nuclear pixelemental, before entry, you were submerged by an ocean of joy and merriment. 

But now you encountered him for real, and ten minutes have barely passed, and your soul is already tired to look at actions which can only be compared to the excretory products of a particularly nonchalant musclebeast.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1561.gif[/img]

To put it roughly, you've had enough of his shit.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1575.gif[/img]

You captchalogue your remains in your gardening modus, lest Edward get it into his head again to merge with you. The mere thought of it gives you the vapors.

Whyever did you let him live, anyway? Another complication. And once more you are under the impression you are forgetting something imperative.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1576.png[/img]

In addition to being a boor, your pixelemental is singularly unintelligent. He did not recall Wey's computer in your possession.

p.c: Batori: Play with the Thaumifice Substratum again.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1577.png[/img]

Lest the churl return and smash yet another screen, you alchemize yourself a fetching POLYCROWNATIC. Now, the time has come to catch up with your teammates.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1581.png[/img]

This conversation was disappointing, but magnificently interesting.

You hadn't thought about Renart in this way in quite some time... yet you believe you will continue to think about him this way for some time.

You're going to need a shower.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1582.png[/img]

This conversation was informative, but infinitely horrifying.

The mere thought of filling pails with anyone one day repulses you... and that's the first time someone directly and verbally expressed concupiscent urges towards you.

You're going to need a shower.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1583.png[/img]

These kinds of antics could continue for some time.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1584.png[/img]

And in fact, it's exactly what happens. But the details of these events shall be left to the reader's imagination.

p.c: Narration: Switch to less happy characters.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1585.png[/img]

Your troll is dead.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1586.png[/img]

And you are in jail.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1587.png[/img]

You could ask for a rope if you were smart enough to understand the concept of suicide and if you were physically tailored to speak.

p.c: Vamuin: You need reinforcements. Go to the orgy.
p.b: [img]./assets/img/story/doomed1588.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1589.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1590.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1591.png[/img]

That's impossible.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1592.png[/img]

You are quite hard to kill. But one thousand of you?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1593.png[/img]

That's impossible.

p.c: Try to find out what killed them all. Preferably from the air.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1594.png[/img]

Man, do you feel woozy.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1595.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1596.png[/img]

The blood pools form a pattern.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1597.png[/img]

p.c: Tepes: Screech. One of the guards will probably get closer to shut you up.
p.b: [img]./assets/img/story/doomed1598.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1599.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1600.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1601.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1602.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1603.png[/img]

p.c: Tepes: Smash their head into that cracked cell bar.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1604.png[/img]

The cellbar is masticated, not cracked.

Luckily (for you), it only means you'll spend more time doing this in order to get the bar twisted enough to escape.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1605.gif[/img]

Something in the game, or in Ginneo's Territory, seems to be broken. You can see nothing but static. Certainly, the shape in the center of the screen appears to be your little one, but he could be tied up, hanged, crucified or taxidermied. And he is offline.

You do hope your diamond is all right. You could fly to his Territory, you suppose, but it would be no mean feat, with the Resident liberated due to a completely and totally unforeseeable consequence of your newfound predilection for pyrotechnics. Unquestionably. None could have predicted such a thing. Beyond that, there are probably angry Concomitants and a newly-completed army of Lieutenants, not to mention a mortiferous and most unruly pixelemental.

Truly, you pray your little darling will be safe, but all the hydras from Limbo could not chase you there.

p.c: Vamuin: Try going back in time to figure out what happened.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1606.png[/img]

You are not able to do this anymore.

Your Time powers seem to not work since you've encountered your Resident. Maybe it poisoned you by touch like some jellyfish? Maybe it has magic-blocking venom? Maybe it is some symbolic fuckassery like you were defeated and ran away from the fight and so you don't "deserve" your continuum-screwing mojo anymore?

You're hella sure it would be too dangerous to do this anyway. You don't know who or what did this, but without your equipment, you don't want to face it. 

Which makes you realize the thing who killed a thousand of you could also kill you.

p.c: Vamuin: Fly away. Try taking a vacation to Prospit. Probably nothing horrible there.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1607.png[/img]

Yes. You need to leave this planet for some time. You alchemized yourself some basic equipment, new clothes, a cap-uter, a weapon, you'll be fine.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1608.png[/img]

Plus you don't want to see your hive anymore. Thanks to this farce of a co-player, it's now the most uncool hive in the entirety of Paradox Space.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1609.png[/img]

But wait, one of these feathered chumps wants to talk.

Dred-Gani brings the little fucker to you in one of its delicate fins.

[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"[u]Rhapsodist[/u]... You were defeated, but it doesn't need to be the end. Don't give up. You brought hope back to this [u]Territory[/u] by destroying the [u]Lieutenants[/u]. Our dead ones are avenged. [u]Rhapsodist[/u], we know what the problem is. We can help you. We have erudite persons and specialists. I can lead you to them."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed409c.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1610.png[/img]


[left][color=#045FB4]- What, yo°u're giving me this NPC crap no°w? No° o°ffense, kid, but yo°u're, like, a limited character fro°m a limited enviro°nment, with limited ideas. I'm go°ing to° search fo°r peo°ple with a mo°re o°verall visio°n.[/color][/left]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1611.png[/img][spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"[u]Rhapsodist[/u], don't go! We need you! Don't leave our world again!"[/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1612.png[/img]


[left][color=#045FB4]- Fuck. O°ff.[/color][/left]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1613.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1614.png[/img] [ [i]Theme: Henifin - The Gift of Forever[/i] ] The Territory of Rainforest and Sepultures is laid bare to you in all its sensuous, warm and primal glory. Giant, tortuous trunks are firmly planted on the rich ground punctuated by large, unshaved brakens, supporting a complex, heavy foliage from which flows of lianas cascade. Pales ruins are kept captive in the gentle embrace of moss, bittersweet and poison ivy. You feel animal life everywhere, hidden in the depths of this primeval maze. Dazed by the moist air, you have trouble focusing on explorations. You see three clear objectives lost in the jungle. There is a sea of brakens containing a particularly impressive ruin, a huge destroyed tower. There is a clear path full of reeds, leading to something which seems to be a statue. There are prints of gargantuan feet, like a giant apocalizard. Where will you go?

p.c: [S] Batori: Chase after the lizard. A noble daywalker like you needs an impressive mount.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1615.png[/img]

You're going to ride this thing like there is no tomorrow.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1616.png[/img]

Actually, no. Before fighting the big enemies, you intend to train on Pucks and other kinds of cannonfodder.

Eternity has taught you to avoid unnecessary risks.

p.c: [S] Batori: Choose the path of reeds.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1617.png[/img]

Promising.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1618.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1619.png[/img]

Uh. Marshes. 

They could be dangerous, you suppose.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1620.png[/img]

For someone who isn't a powerful Rainbow Drinker.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1620b.png[/img]

Using your privileges as a Lunatic Primacy, you enter the center of the royal court.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1620c.png[/img]

Skipping the salutations, you expose your past journey and your current problems to the Feminine Coruscant Sovereignty.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1620d.png[/img]

She looks angry at first about what she describes as a complete disrespect of your responsibilities, but quickly she starts making sense again. When she learns about your defeat and the massacre of your doubles, she suddenly seems extremely concerned.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1620e.png[/img]

She leads you to the national library, indicating information is the most powerful weapon you can find now.

Information? Wow. No wonder these folks are destined to lose.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1621.png[/img]

This is a quite majestic figure.

p.c: Batori: Talk to the green cats.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622a.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"Hello, beautiful adventurer! We are watching over the place of the [u]True Awakening[/u], where the expected [u]Hero[/u] is meant to rise a second time. The prophecies don't tell if they succeed, but deep inside this landmark to her glory, the most sacred monument is waiting."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622b.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"This ancient land is full of mysteries and ancient riddles. I wonder if anyone will be crazy enough to resolve the puzzle of the [u]128 Receptacles of Chronology[/u]. It is said the [u]Ultimate Weapon[/u] would reward such an ingenious person... but who could outsmart the intelligence of our ancestors?"[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622c.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"My wife saw the [u]Enchantress[/u] performing this strange thing called a 'kiss' on a fresco. She wanted to try it out. It went as well as you can guess."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622d.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"These new house decorations, the [u]Radiant Roses[/u], came out and became the most fashionable accessories in our entire society. Everyone wanted to prettify their shack with one of these big gold nuggets. Even the [u]Guardian Masks[/u] were seduced and put them as jewelry on their foreheads."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622e.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"It turned out to be an elaborated ruse. The [u]Masks[/u]' reaction had been the [u]Apocryptid Resident[/u]'s plan all along! The [u]Radiant Roses[/u] were actually artifacts and allowed this powerful entity to enslave our loyal watchers. The [u]Guardian Masks[/u] became its [u]Lieutenants[/u]."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622f.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"As you can guess, we are not about to run out of catnip here. Want to try some? It's good stuff."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622g.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"This is a peaceful, warm, generous environment. We [u]Smilodons[/u] spend most of our time just chilling on big rocks here."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622h.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"If you see my husband, tell him it's his own fault. I told him to be gentle, goddammit."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622i.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"Man, I think I took too much catnip... I'm tripping, man, you can't even know."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622j.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"My greetyngs, radyant one. V-Vould Y turn as lovely as you yf Y took a lyck of your beautyful skyn?"[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622k.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"... What, are you expecting some philosophy? Too bad, girl, I only care about having a good nap here."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622l.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"Purrrr purrr."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622m.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"Stop annoying us. It's nap time. Why, do you think you own the place or something? If you dig big words, go talk to Hegel. You may have to bypass the two assholes talking about backstory all the time, though."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622n.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"At the beginning of the universe, it was only the Sea of Nightmares. Nothing could exist in it without being devoured by pure darkness. The darkness was not sentient, it was a furious, abominable life. Then the fishermen, rifting on the surface on the sea, thought they could take subsistence from it. They cut their ankles and their wrists and dropped flows of their cosmic blood inside the darkness, and the blood gave energy to the darkness, and the blood began coagulating, and the darkness with it. The darkness left only the Water of Existence behind, concentrating into tiny shapes. And that's how lifeforms came to exist."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622o.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"The lifeforms too close to the surface were fished, but finally the fishermen left, satisfied. Only one of them stayed... [u]The Conjuring One[/u]. It cut its ankles and wrists again, until it was only stumps, and it turned them into fins, because it was a powerful wizard. Then the entity dived into the Water of Existence, searching for more food."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622p.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"It may be that Romantic Art, as art, does not bring this content into prominence, as was done in great measure in the Symbolic, and, above all, in the Classic form of Art, with its ideal gods. As we have already seen, this art is not, as art, the revealed teaching (Belehren) which produces the content of truth directly only in the form of art for the imagination, but the content is already at hand for itself outside the region of art in imagination and sensuous perception. Here, religion, as the universal consciousness of truth in a wholly other sphere (Grade), constitutes the essential point of departure for art. It lies quite outside the external modes of manifestation for the actual consciousness, and makes its appearance in sensuous reality as prosaic events belonging to the present. 
Romantic Art no longer has for its aim this free vitality of actual existence, in its infinite calmness and submergence of the soul in the corporeal, nor even this life, as such, in its most precious significance, but turns its back upon this highest phase beauty. Indeed, it interweaves its inner being with the accidentality of external organisation, and allows unrestricted play room to the marked characteristics of the ugly."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622q.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"Yes, me again. You've been speaking to my wife, haven't you? Tell her she's the one who wanted the kiss to be wild. Well, she can be happy. It was so wild we could 'kiss' our fangs bye-bye.
Fuck, this entire marriage was a big colossal error. Do you know [u]a good lawyer[/u] or something?"[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622d.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"Soon the Last Fisherman came to our world. An alien entity, fundamentally different, impossible to understand. Bigger than us. It tried to devour our very [u]Territory[/u], and only by a fierce and neverending fight did the [u]Guardian Masks[/u] defeat it. They beat it with its own weapon, cosmic, forbidden magic. They sealed [u]The Conjuring One[/u] underground, shaping oversized runes for the spell and disrupting the very stellar order, and the blood of the sinister entity, once again, coagulated the universe into lifeforms. It is how this land became so rich and prosperous. Because of the [u]Resident[/u]'s blood."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622r.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"It is still here, sealed... [u]The Conjuring One[/u]. If the stars were to be lined up once again, it would come back, and this time, the [u]Guardian Masks[/u], corrupted by the [u]Radiant Roses[/u], would be its servants."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622s.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"The [u]Enchantress[/u] must wake up the [u]Range Roarers[/u]! It's the only way to ever complete the [u]Revolution of Perpetuation[/u]!"[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622t.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open NPC log" close="Close NPC log"][left]"Just say to my husband I'm keeping the children."[/left][/spoiler][img]./assets/img/story/doomed1622i.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1623.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1641.png[/img]

You manage to effectuate a collection of excruciatingly difficult puzzles involving multiple mathematical systems and dead languages. By some means, this game appears to have knowledge of ancient Alternian alphabets.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1642.png[/img]

There was also a crucial riddle about mystical runes, except that they were not, in fact, runes. They were logograms. At long last, you realized each sentence was a spell: the first glyph represented the cosmic alignment, the second one the action to be taken, and the third one the effect. Sometimes, there was a fourth symbol indicating a target or a subtelty, but the global grammar was quite simple for a being of your great wisdom.

Here, the first spell means [Yellow God - Thunder - Death], the second one [Red God - Fire - Ground] and the third one [Blue God - Protect - Launcher].

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1643.png[/img]

You feel supremely exhausted. It may have merely taken several hours, but it felt like entire [i]weeks[/i].

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1644.png[/img]

According to the riddles, the stars in this temple are now lined up. You are one step closer to the return of your Resident. Fortune has smiled on you, however, and to right the stars completely, you must yet solve the puzzles of another temple, completely secondary. You now have opportunity to rendezvous with your team. Oh, and a cathartic levelgrinding session would be nice as well.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1645.png[/img]

And at last, with this final switch...

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1646.png[/img]

... Blast it all.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1647.png[/img]

It appears easy enough: you must form a sentence using the logograms.

[Skaia - Ascend - Launcher]

Nevertheless, it feels as if you suffered forever on this single dial. What is this game, [u][i]Myst[/i][/u], [u][i]Musclebeast Island[/i][/u], [u][i]Broken Sickle[/i][/u]?

You swear to nevermore touch a puzzle in your life.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1648.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1649.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1650.png[/img]

It is your Quest Recuperacoon.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1651.png[/img]

You have been wrapped securely in delusion for so long that you nearly even believe it, but deep down, you still know you are an ordinary troll, and not even one from a longevity-gifted caste. Fragile. Fleeting.

Mortal.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1652.png[/img]

This game was your single, tantalizing chance to survive the cruel limitation of your natural state. To cease being subjected to a bitter, arbitrary end, and to reach another state of existence.

You were so close.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1653.png[/img]

But in the end, in that crucial moment, you were unable to take that chance.

You will never become an immortal.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1654.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1656.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1657.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1658.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1659.png[/img]

p.c: Cross: Looks like you'll just have to figure out a way to do it for her.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1678b.gif[/img]

You can't. She has already captchalogued her corpse. And you're not sure Renart would agree to prototype the sprite without her consent.
You'll figure out something, though. There's no way in hell you're not getting 100% completion. Even if you have to offer this entire team of useless fucktards a godhood they never deserved.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1679.png[/img]

For now, there are more pressing matters. You immediatly leave the basement to take the nearest vehicle from an already meteored hive. Wow, this sure was quickly summed up, and even skipping the usual lusus-related events. But that's good in your book. You have to be quick. Now that the other players are roughly secured, you still need to save Sectra from the city in flames.

There is also the small problem of Vamuin planning a complete annihilation of both the incipisphere and the entire universe. 

You can only trust Batori to handle it. At least, for the time being.

p.c: Batori: There has to be OTHER sprites.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1680.png[/img]

Maybe... Maybe you can use the pixelemental of someone else.

The only question is, will you merge with the schizophrenic whale, the utter abomination of everything that is dead or alive, or wait with the fallacious hope that someone doesn't turn their familiar into an even worse obscenity.

Maybe you can persuade Renart, Cross or Sectra to fuse their own pixelemental with a book from the Lestat series or something like this. Such a perspective could be slightly more manageable. Or something else. There is a wide range of possibilities.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1681.png[/img]


[left][color=#6C5926]- My beloved![/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1682.png[/img]


[left][color=#6C5926]- You see now that our story was always meant to be![/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1683.png[/img]


[left][color=#6C5926]- Do you ever think that your life would be easier if you weren't in love with me?[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1684.png[/img]


[left][color=#6C5926]- Could you believe, despite all that I've put you through, that I love you, too?[/color][/left]

p.c: Batori: Maybe there's some way you can settle this nonviolently? You could send him to go check on Ginneo, perhaps.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1685.png[/img]


[left][color=#6C5926]- No. You are my life now.[/color][/left]

p.c: Batori: Grab the protruding features on the sides of his face and give them a shake.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1686.png[/img]


[left][color=#6C5926]- Would you please tell me what you're thinking? BEFORE I go mad?[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1687.png[/img]


[left][color=#6C5926]- B-Batori, c-cont-trol your-r-self. I-I could k-kill you. D-Do I always have t-to be the resp-ponsible one?[/color][/left]

p.c: Vamuin: How the hell can you find a Resident before they exist?
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1688.png[/img]

Easy enough. All of the Concomitants, Lieutenants and other game elements are currently being loaded through the system, in a frozen state.

You just have to find the biggest white statue in the planet, or to wait for its appearance. You sure hope the "Delving One" is amongst the first enemies to solidify. Time is working against you.

For now, you see three distinct possibilities through the 3D grid of interlaced, fluid spirographs: a big white giant, a big white mountain, and a big white snake.

Which one will you choose?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1689.png[/img]

You fail amazingly.

[left][color=#868A08]- Shall you ever shov-v your face before my eyes agayn, v-ve v-vyll both dyscover hov-v v-vell you take beyng decapytated then epytomyzed wyth a load gaper. Such a treatment can only amelyorate matter![/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1690.png[/img]

Coming back to a more constructive activity.

You are on your way to finishing the most complicated enigma of your Territory, the 128 Receptacles of Chronology. According to the Concomitants, it's supposed to give you the "Ultimate Weapon". Obtaining it could be a good idea, especially since you are not about to reach God Tier soon.

This is complicated, though. You need to close then to open the various Receptacles of Chronology in a very precise order. There are different types of Time Capsules, they open in different ways (mainly with levers, buttons and dials) and they accelerate, freeze or reverse the state of things. You have items to move from a Time Capsule to another, in a precise order, too. 

You're using the calculator of your polycrownatic to do the maths, but it's taking a lot of time. And sometimes, you find this kind of mysterious text supposed to help you to set the next timer, minutes and seconds, precisely:

[i]Eyes share it with the nostrils,
Ears are hearing and repeating it,
The nose is there, in the middle, unique,
Once again, yes, the horns draw it, third time's a charm.[/i]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1691.png[/img]

FLYING ZOMBIE WAR BUS GO!
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1692.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1693.png[/img]

Jackpot!

This isn't much of a mountain, rather a big, complex temple. You recognize it from the files you hacked an eternity before. It is BEROS-KEROS, and it is the lair of Sectra's Resident.

Even untextured, its architecture looks sinister, cyclopean. And you know this gigantic building is promising a crazy labyrinth. Usually this shit is filled with little Lieutenants presenting a particularly abominable, organic danger to any Player, but right now, they will be nothing more than inoffensive statues.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1694.png[/img]


[left][color=#B041FF]- Vamuin...[/color]
[color=#045FB4]- I kno°w, I kno°w! Yo°u canno°t enter a Resident's lair.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1695.png[/img]


[left][color=#736AFF]- Dude... We are so...[/color]
[color=#045FB4]- I kno°w. Do°n't say ano°ther wo°rd.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1696.png[/img]


[left][color=#045FB4]- I have a plan. They nerfed me well, but I have a plan. I'm no°t do°ne yet.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1697.png[/img]


[left][color=#B041FF]-[/color] [color=#736AFF]V[/color][color=#B041FF]a[/color][color=#736AFF]m[/color][color=#B041FF]u[/color][color=#736AFF]i[/color][color=#B041FF]n[/color] [color=#736AFF]![/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1698.png[/img]


[left][color=#045FB4]- Dude, babe. Co°o°l do°wn. Everything is fro°zen in here.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1699.png[/img]

Inside, you can see the Lieutenants on every wall.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1700.png[/img]

And you really hate what you're seeing.

These appendages are delicate filaments rather than thick, annelid-like, muddy arms, but a tentacle will always be a tentacle.

p.c: Vamuin: You sure about this, dude?
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1701.png[/img]

No, you aren't sure.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1702.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1703.png[/img]

You do so. You are extremely tense. Your entire body is ready to react, to run away, if anything moves.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1704.png[/img]

You push a little door leading to a new corridor.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1705.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1706.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1707.png[/img]

You're safe.

It's frozen and rooted in the stone. Juste like the other Lieutenants.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1708.png[/img]

You're feeling more and more dizzy since Horologiom.

And now, you know perfectly why.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1709.png[/img]

You can take seeing a few more - immobile - tentacles on your way to end all this.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1710.png[/img]

Hell. This door is apparently meant to be opened with a riddle. Trouble is, without any texture, you have no way to know said riddle.

How will you open it?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1711.png[/img]

... This door has eyes.

Let's test a theory.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1712.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1713.png[/img]



[ [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yVPkveD4x-U]Theme: MoNACA & Nishimura - Gods bound by rules[/url] ]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1714.png[/img]

You should probably have barricaded Batori's castle when you had the chance. It is too dangerous for her outside.

The problem is your love doesn't understand the danger. You can't prove yourself worthy if she doesn't feel threatened.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1715.png[/img]

Your suffering is leading you to dark extremes, but that's for her own good. She needs to understand you want only to protect her.... But most importantly, she needs to accept her feelings.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1716.png[/img]

This thing manages to look even worse than its Lieutenants.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1717.png[/img]

Whatever. You have a needle to loot.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1718.png[/img]

Or rather, a sting.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1719.png[/img]

You complete the last of the clockwork riddles your little dove left cautiously unachieved.

She'll know the danger.

And you will protect her.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1720.png[/img]

You saw rather than cutting. You're lucky because while frozen, this thing keeps its bodily consistency. But it's still very tough. It's a boss' tail, after all.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1721.png[/img]

The second it's finished, you feel the shock.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1722.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1723.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1724.png[/img]

You feel the mutilation.

You become crazy with pain and hatred.

But you cannot move.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1725.png[/img]

You feel the stars are right.

And you can definitely move.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1726.png[/img]

Your suffering lasted for aeons. Your sleep was made from darkest ink and palest flesh. Forthwith, you are only tormented by the deep urge to share and multiply your pain.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1727.png[/img]

Like your master, you are unable to move.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1728.png[/img]

But you can plan, with cold precision and subtle cruelty, what you are going to do after your real birth.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1729.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1730.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1731.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1732.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1733.png[/img]

You realize you've probably made your biggest mistake.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1734.png[/img]

Yes. Since you are not about to reach God Tier anytime soon, your pixelemental, even as unintelligent as he can be, will be a serious help to face a Player who is still technically God Tier.

You do not know if you are powerful enough to defeat Vamuin, but hopefully you can slow him down while Cross figures something out.

You don't understand immediately.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1763.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"][i]Before you, Batori, our lives were like a moonless night. Very dark, but there were stars--points of light and reason... And then you shot across our sky like a meteor. Suddenly everything was on fire; there was brilliancy, there was beauty. When you were gone, when the meteor had fallen over the horizon, everything went black. Nothing had changed, but our eyes were blinded by the light. We couldn't see the stars anymore. And there was no more reason for anything.
Please accept this little present, residue of a former rival.

No measure of time with you will be long enough, but we'll start with forever.


With love, the Subaltern Conscr-1-pts[/i][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1890.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1891.png[/img]

The club was decorated with a lot of posters. Philosophical, arty movies. Surprisingly watchable propaganda flicks. Terrible films, like this historical movie with Troll Bela Lugosi which was arguably the most boring story of undead and space conquest ever realized. And classics full of high-flown dialogues, featuring fierce musclebeasts, traditional emblem of Alternian nobility.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1892.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1894.png[/img]

If you were Via, you couldn't remember a single word said past this point.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1895.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1896.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1897.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1898.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1899.png[/img]

It was the first time you'd met Tozy.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1900.png[/img]

At the time, he was in love with a classical romance movie, As Adapted From The Quintessentially Popular Live Performance Variation, A Cinematic Edition Of The Story Of An Eight-Sweep-Old Teal-Blooded Troll Girl Who Spends A Recreational Dark Season Away From Her Hive's Continent, Where She Meets And Falls For A Local Eight-Sweep-Old Rustblood Whose Passions Include The Repair And Maintainence Of Automotive Vehicles And Cultivating His Slick Persona And Hairstyle With His Local Gang Of Similar Male Companions Who Provide Comic Relief And Secondary Romantic Interaction, And To Whom He Confides About The Romantic Tryst To In A Spirited Musical Number As She Does Likewise To The Members Of The Local Cinematic Appreciation Club She Has Joined Against Her Initial Plans To Return Home, Which Ironically He Is Also A Member Of, A Fact To Which She Remains Blissfully Unaware Until They Are Reunited By A Limeblooded Troublemaker Who Seeks The Affections Of The Male Lead; Further Misadventures Ensuing From His Rough Persona And Conflicts Between Their Time Together At Club And His Automotive Gang, Former Romantic Interests And Their Associates, Multiple Dance Numbers, An Intense Race Scene Culminating Violently, And A Shocking Change Of Styles For Both Protagonists Culminating In A Mutually Established Romance At The Closing-Down Ceremony Of The Cinematic Club Concluded By Unexpected And Genre-Defying Vehicular Flight. 

You always liked this motion picture, especially its strange narrative structure and the absence of real focus on the main protagonists.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1901.png[/img]

But to reach your romantic goal, you immediately pretended it was completely worthless and, to speak frankly, a piece of shit.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1902.png[/img]

This part of the plan was a complete success.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1903.png[/img]

If you were Via, you would remember how naive you were back then.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1904.png[/img]

You supposed this hate at first sight would weaken with time.

But it didn't. The more you learned about Tozy, the more you loathed him.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1905.png[/img]

Dark seasons passed.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1906.png[/img]

By constantly making fun of his pompadour, you convinced him to change haircut. It wasn't the intended effect, but the change was nothing to complain about. If anything, it made him hotter.

So cold. So caustic.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1907.png[/img]

Dark seasons passed.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1908.png[/img]

You came more and more frequently to the movie club, hoping to see him more, hoping and fearing to hate him more.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1909.png[/img]

Dark seasons passed.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1910.png[/img]

He was so cold and precise in his mockery.

You didn't even have the ordinary nightmares of your species anymore. Only dreams. Dreams of hate.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1911.png[/img]

Dark seasons passed.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1912.png[/img]

And on the 7th bilunar perigee of the 5th dark season's equinox, suddenly, it was time to say goodbye to the movie club. Just like that. A sinister story like Alternia is bound to bear lead to the closure of the hive.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1913.png[/img]

There was a big party like trolls often do to celebrate the pleasure to never see each other anymore. Nearly all of the movie club was there, plus some faces you had never seen before.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1914.png[/img]

And this day, you managed to lure him in an empty room, and to lock it behind you.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1915.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1916.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1917.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1918.png[/img]

But he couldn't do it. 

He wasn't really violent, he couldn't bring himself to give in to the level of brutality you needed. When you insulted him, he looked hurt. When you bit him, he started crying.

You stopped. He stopped. This rivalry was not working, and you had both realized it.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1919.png[/img]

He wasn't even really in hate with you. And he couldn’t perform on the long run.

His coldness was in fact only shyness, and his lines petty provocations.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1920.png[/img]

[url=Alabaster.html?p=816]You stayed friends with him[/url]. It was hard to say no to him.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1921.png[/img]

And now you feel pretty sure you'll never see him again.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1922.png[/img]

If you were Via, you also would be surprised to know another character is preceding you to Renart's house.

p.c: Vamuin: Meet Renart on the way.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1925.png[/img]

Whatever. If you reach your Territory, this guy won't exist anymore. He will never have existed at all.

[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]Sectra, I love you.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1952.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]Give attention to my words for a change. I love you. There's no way around it, I love you. This feeling is like a jewel-decorated sickle, it looks magnificent but it's hurting me, buried deep in my heart. I've tried to fight against it. I feel half of my life has been wasted trying to fight against it. Maybe it would have been better if I had left your side and I had tried to meet more people, to leave you behind. This is unrequited matespritship. This isn't good.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1953.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]And I never had the strength to tell you seriously, face to face. Every time it came out sounding like a joke, every time in some unrelated context, every time you just heard it as "You're my best friend ever in the world". Or maybe you didn't. On some level, you knew about my feelings, didn't you? There are always some secrets both sides know about, which aren't really secret, but which need to stay silent, in order to keep some semblance of balance.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1954.png[/img] 


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]Love. This isn't capriciousness. I told you, I tried to change my heart. Couldn't be helped. Your hair, your voice, your curves, your mouth, your eyes. Any of your features move me, even your worst habits, even the way you've plastered your respiteblock with weird shipping.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1955.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]To act accordingly to my feelings, to take the bull by the horns, to propose or to leave you and to find another way to live. I was too cowardly to do any of it. And now we're here, during the end of the world, and it's all too late. I don't even know if you're alive, but from what you've told me, not only are you alive, but you have a way to save yourself, and to save me? I can't be sure of it. I wanted to ask about it, but it's been hours since my cellarva stopped working. Damned meteors. They surely took out some satellite or communication tower or whatever the hell supports the network.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1956.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]Even so, maybe I could reach you, maybe I can be saved. Do I even want to stay alive? There's something sick in all of this shit. Sometimes our world feels so twisted to me, like there was a black void in its center emptying it of sense. Or maybe the reverse, a presence, a bubble? A white anomaly irradiating madness. A spider extending its revolting web. But then again, maybe sentient creatures are bound to feel like that. To feel like the universe is wrong. Every sky is venom for the doomed creatures walking under it.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1957.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]After all... Maybe I want to stay alive. Do I really want to die without having even filled any of my quadrants? A complete quadravirgin? Yes, I could stay alive. It's still not too late to find my own road in life.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1958.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]However, I have some things to deal with first. Two things - the first is to ensure you're going to read my words. Sadly, I have no way to get directly in touch with you now, so I'm entrusting my custodian with this letter. Blue-blooded lusii are amongst the strongest and most trustworthy ones. Mimesis is entirely lawful to me, to her place in the world, and she will be able to find a way back your hive. Be nice to her, okay? She always liked you.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1959.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]I really hope you will manage to get out of this alive, sis, even if I don't imagine how. This apocalypse is only getting worse. Do you have a spaceship waiting for you somewhere? I don't get any of this "Entry" shit. What has arisen inside you recently? You look like some medium, focused on a holy mission. Whatever you plan to do, be smart, okay?[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1960.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]My love. Unlucky love. I always knew I had cat-in-hell chances, but there I was. Always behind you. Always imitating your shipping. Never expressing myself. Keeping everything carelessly hidden in some corner of my soul. Meaningless scribble. I despise myself.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1961.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]Even if I wanted to, I couldn't stop this outpouring of feelings. I've kept them tightly locked up in this jar, and I can't stop them now that there isn't any sense in them. You know sometimes I hated you, Sectra? I was often on the verge of blacker passion. Or maybe platonic hate. I just wanted you to see how much I had to offer you, how much we were made for each other. I wanted to kill you.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1962.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]Reckless, yeah? But it didn't last. Because deeply, I still wanted you as friend. As more than a friend. That's why I couldn't hate you, that's why I couldn't leave you. You were a sweet delusion in my heart, Sectra, but I stopped at a fork between hearts and diamonds. I knew one day I would have to say goodbye to the diamonds. It wasn't honestly pale. But it was all I had, it was all we both had.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1963.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]Oh, do you remember the earliest sweeps, Sectra? This little place by the sea? How life was sweet as honey in those days. I still remember the night we first met, when the carpenter droids were almost done building my hive. But before moving in, I wanted to have a look at the first hive I saw in the surroundings. The first hive of the town, older trolls told me. The broken tower. We met, and we immediately loved each other. Innocent love, back then. We were like twins, doing everything together. Sometimes I think it was the best way we could feel about each other. Maybe you never stopped feeling this way about me.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1964.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]Now it's the end. I'm getting rid of these fake identities. I'm finally myself, and there's something else I want to get rid of before joining you. Or at least, I'll try. I can only try. You refused to believe me, you may have thought I was jealous. That's what I get for the impurity of my feelings. Maybe I stayed with you with selfish goals, because I wanted you. But I'm about to do something altruistic for a change. I'm going to kill him.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1965.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]

[left][color=#000099]I can barely remember who I am any more. That's so ridiculous. I have a name besides Copycat, you know.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed1966.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open letter" close="Close letter"]



[right][color=#000099]Remember my name.[/color][/right][/spoiler]

You heard your troll's call and approached the ziggurat, only to find it surrounded with easy preys.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2073.png[/img]

Such... easy preys...
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2074.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2075.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2076.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2077.png[/img]

In a Necronom tree, one of the thoughest vegetal species on Alternia...

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2078.png[/img]

In the basement...

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2079.png[/img]

You are now the roleplayer.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2080.png[/img]

Your name is CROSSOVER. Actually, this is not your name, but you were bored to death with the naming conventions of this background, and you always hated TYANHA POLNIU anyway. A female character name stereotypically ending with a "a" would be bad enough already, but you were also unlucky enough to inherit a catgirl-like "niuh". You platonically hate your appellation.

Like most terrible settings, Alternia's character creation is confusing the race and the job - here, more the BLOOD and the CLASS. Apparently, you are supposed to be a NOBLE because you were born inside the blue caste. Well, fuck this pre-rolled shit, the same random rules which deprived you of real musculature, stylish lusus and psionic powers. And which gave you four quadrants to fill before the arbitrary threshold of adulthood. You platonically hate this world with a passion...

You have a variety of INTERESTS. But you won't talk about them now because this is the worst way of introducing a character. If someone wants to truly know you, they just have to look at the sheets. All thirty of them. And your detailed chronicles for your character's action. They could also look at other characters of you, come on, CROSSOVER has to be amongst the less interesting ones.

You have ONE MAIN INTEREST anyway, and everything else is revolving around it, and it's TABLETOP ROLEPLAYING. Those are golden letters above a large door to you, and the door leads to NARRATION, HEROISM, FASCINATING INQUIRIES, POWERFUL TRAGEDIES and LEGENDARY EPICS. 
At least when the LORE is coherent. ALTERNIA isn't, it is developed entirely around ridiculous jokes and makes no sense whatsoever, so you prefer to spend your time submerged in much better games such as CAHOWA, SENZAR, FROM ANOTHER TIME; ANOTHER LAND, ADVANCED DUMBASSES & DIMWITS, SYNNIBAR, HYBRID, RAINBOW DRINKER: THE MOCKERY, or MUSCLEBEAST: THE CATASTROPHE.

You take pride in your energetic, penetrating and meticulous mind. Since Alternia is your main CROSSROAD-world, with a MYST-like book interface to other universes, you have to preserve your avatar as well as you can - with time, you came to know a lot about its STUPID LORE. It's a huge part of your tomes, and this gratuitous apocalypse thing, impossibly linked to some elusive cosmic game, is your last trial to allow this particular incarnation to munchkin its way to godhood. You are applying all of your cerebral resources to this session. You are going to show everyone how this game is played.

Your trolltag is [color=#08088A]criticalOutlander[/color] and [color=#08088A]✝o s✝ay e✘act, you do✝ your i's and cross your ✝'s![/color]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2081.png[/img]

You go through your nest: deep in the roots of the Necronom tree, a hive built entirely from manuals. All of your universes are here. Sadly, a huge portion of it is still dedicated to this crappy setting, in order to ensure the Cross avatar s survival... Soon, it won't matter anymore.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2082.png[/img]

You pass by SYRACUS, your CUSTODIAN, which you locked into one of the underground rooms. You do not like this, but your eagle-owl lusus is not going to die inanely like your coplayers'.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2083.png[/img]

Your respiteblock is wallpapered with old sprite sheets. Characters who ascended, characters who retired. Characters who died.

You keep all of the current ones in strictly organized folders elsewhere. There are two rooms of them.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2084.png[/img]

Instead of a traditional recuperacoon, you invested in a brand-new THRONECOON. This way, you save time between the tabletop sessions and sleep. You don't have time to spend fooling around. 

A player lives and dies by their roleplaying table.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2085.png[/img]

[i]Tiger, tiger, burning bright  
In the forests of the night,  
What immortal hand or eye  
Could frame thy fearful symmetry?  
 
In what distant deeps or skies 
Burnt the fire of thine eyes?  
On what wings dare he aspire?  
What the hand dare seize the fire?  
 
And what shoulder and what art  
Could twist the sinews of thy heart?
And when thy heart began to beat,  
What dread hand and what dread feet?  
 
What the hammer? what the chain?  
In what furnace was thy brain?  
What the anvil? What dread grasp
Dare its deadly terrors clasp?  
 
When the stars threw down their spears,  
And water'd heaven with their tears,  
Did He smile His work to see?  
Did He who made the lamb make thee?
 
Tiger, tiger, burning bright  
In the forests of the night,  
What immortal hand or eye  
Dare frame thy fearful symmetry?[/i]

A courteous yet strong Carapacian gentleman appears, and tells you the opposite.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2208.png[/img]

The alabaster individual politely introduces himself as the Indefatigable Plenipotentiary, secret agent on Her Majesty's service.

He admits you performed a lot of bad deeds, and never cared about his Sovereignty. Furthermore, you abandoned your Concomitants at the worst time and may have betrayed the other heroes.

But that doesn't mean you are beyond redemption, nor that you [i]should[/i] be abandoned, mauled, maimed, or killed.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2209.png[/img]

You proceed to tell him rather extensively and expressively he's just throwing up some Prospitian bullshit. Actions have consequences.

He answers he never said otherwise. His point is while justice systems may be necessary to protect society from dangerous elements, punishment is an irrelevant concept, and may even be cruel par nature. And that includes one's self-punishment.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2210.png[/img]

You say it once again: it's no surprise they are doomed to lose the war.

He declares you deal badly with your guilt. Instead of accepting it and trying to make the best of it, you treat it like an enemy. It makes you vulnerable.

If you are [i]really[/i] sorry, you'll try to spend your life becoming a better being, helping others.

You tell him your life is behind you.

[left][color=#08088A]Did you see ✝he world ou✝side? Even before ✝he me✝eors.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2357.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]A world where i✝ was alrigh✝ ✝o be massive dicks ✝o each o✝her.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2358.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]A world where you were supposed ✝o be glad if once in a while, shi✝ didn'✝ happen ✝o you.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2359.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]I had ✝o live in ✝ha✝ world. Everybody had ✝o.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2360.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]Bu✝ I escaped. Every✝ime I could, I flew away from ✝his fucked-up exis✝ence. When many people jus✝ gri✝✝ed ✝heir ✝ee✝h and decided ✝o endure i✝ "because i✝ was how ✝he world was", I flew ✝he fuck away.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2361.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]And I ✝ook friends wi✝h me.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2362.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]And ✝oge✝her, for a while, we would forge✝ abou✝ wha✝ o✝hers wan✝ed us ✝o do for ✝hem ; and we did ✝hings for ourselves.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2363.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]✝here was no finali✝y; i✝ was all make-believe.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2364.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]✝here was no concre✝e gain; apar✝ from no✝ going fucking crazy, and ge✝✝ing depressed, and slowly wi✝hering and dying in a world ✝ha✝ was forced on us.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2365.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]I✝s rules were no✝ for us, so when we could, we ignored ✝hem and used our own.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2366.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]We were dreamers, and poe✝s, and vagran✝s. Self-proclaimed ou✝cas✝s. We were fools, spending our ✝ime and energy on ✝hings ✝ha✝ only we could see, hear, experience, remember.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2367.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]We lived hundreds of lives. Fel✝ love, and joy, and pi✝y, and anger, and i✝ was all in our heads. 
So wha✝? I✝ was life as we wan✝ed ✝o experience i✝. No✝ as people wan✝ed us ✝o experience i✝ jus✝ because ✝ha✝'s how ✝hey did.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2368.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]✝he world was a mediocre and disappoin✝ing place. ✝hey chose ✝o s✝ay and pu✝ up wi✝h i✝, we chose ✝o go away and keep our inner flame burning.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2369.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]Don'✝ le✝ anyone, ever, ✝ell you ✝ha✝ you're no✝ living your life "as you should".[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2370.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]Maybe one day you'll regre✝ ✝hose hours spen✝ wi✝h friends around a ✝able, crea✝ing charac✝ers, ignoring dice resul✝s, and living o✝her lives, when you could have been ou✝side.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2371.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]Or maybe you won'✝, and you'll remember ✝hese days as ✝he bes✝ years of your life.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2372.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]If you do regre✝, well... You were doing wha✝ gave you pleasure a✝ ✝he ✝ime. ✝ha✝'s life. Making mis✝akes is par✝ of ✝ha✝.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2373.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]As for me... I've always been very dedica✝ed.
And now ✝ha✝ ✝he end is nigh,  I'm no✝ asking myself wha✝ would someone be✝✝er ✝han me do. I ask myself who am I, and wha✝ would ✝HA✝ person do.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2374.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]And ✝he basic, mos✝ ✝ru✝hful answer is ✝ha✝ I am a player. A player of games, of life, and of dea✝h.[/color][/left]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2375.png[/img]


[left][color=#08088A]And a player lives and dies by ✝heir roleplaying ✝able.[/color][/left]

In a half-immersed hive far away from the shores...

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2390.png[/img]


A powerful, athletic, richly-clothed troll stands in her respiteblock. It just so happens that today, the 6th bilunar perigee of the 5th dark season's equinox, is the day of this young troll's destruction.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2391.png[/img]


Your name is AUSIRA HEKATE.

Flowing through your veins is nearly the richest blood the hemospectrum has to offer, penultimate on the scale. As such, you are a SEA DWELLER, a sub-race of troll distinct from the commoners by mutation and habitat, a caste which rules over the entire species.

You bathe and gloat in the glory of your species, and you always make sure that in your surroundings, every cast behaves according to their rank and quality. From violet to burgundy, they are all parts of the beauty of the strongest space nation, the Empire bound to conquer every star and every planet. 

You hold a fascination for FINE ARTS and all facets of CLASSIC AESTHETICS. It made you closer to some sensitive individual of the lowest blood than to other creatures of the highest castes, for often your fellow purple-veined companions can lack refinement. Particularly the fashion-endeared Vamuin Ikenga, whose antics are as demeaning as they are enraging.

You are especially skilled in PAINTING and POTTERY, but you train in all kinds of artistic activities. You also dive into HUNTING and SPORTS with a passion, making sure to offer the best performance possible in each physical field into which you venture.

Your trolltag is [color=#6a006a]upbraidersRage[/color] and [color=#6a006a]when.ever yʘu spe.ak, yʘu alwa.ys ma.ke a pʘint[/color].

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2392.png[/img]


Your hive is full of refined decoration crafted by your Skylpe contact unsettlingMerchant. He often has trouble obtaining new material, so he cannot satisfy all of your requests... But a new party is coming. And after every party, the Artisan receives a delivery of new material.

You receive an invitation for every party, but you never come, for unsettlingMerchant is a rust blood and you do not endorse his delusions of grandeur.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2393.png[/img]

Beauty... magnificence...

Your favorite painting is THE HIGHBLOOD FIGHTING HIS LUSUS TO THE DEATH, but you must admit DECAPITATEBALL CHAMPION FACING A MUSCLEBEAST is a close second.
You have countless other masterpieces, masterfully wrought scenes sublimating everything the Empire’s culture hold precious and sacred, but you spent a lot of money on those two and wasted numerous sleepless days contemplating them.

Ah... Decapitateball Champion...

p.c: Ausira: Look at the INFERIOR SURFACE DWELLER NEWS.
p.b: [img]./assets/img/story/doomed2394.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2395.png[/img]


Another noble framed by the populace. When will your people remember their values? When will such oppression of the rich be stopped?

p.c: Why look at INFERIOR SURFACE DWELLER NEWS when you can read SUPERIOR SEA DWELLER NEWS.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2396.png[/img]


Finally some quality information.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2397.png[/img]


You personally do not like this prominent figure of the Nautical Aristocracy. It is rumoured that Feferi Peixes is reluctant towards the most fundamental aspects of politics, such as culling, large industrial companies, leaving the mother planet to children, culling, bloodism, culling, military conquest, culling and culling.

Such a feeble-minded individual cannot possibly hope to lead the Empire to further glory. 

If she ever reaches the throne, you and the rest of the nobility will support her, of course. No matter her political divergences with the current statu quo, your loyalty cannot be questioned. You will surround her. Help to relieve her thinkpan from the most prosaic matters, with delicious drugs or other distractions worthy of her rank. Gentry will not let vulgar judgments and legislation sully the Heir’s hands, and her every order will be interpreted judiciously.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2398.png[/img]


You cannot be PAST SECTRA because she's taking pics for Ophiuchus the Great!

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2399.png[/img]


Well, what is this? It seems something crashed on the roof.

p.c: Ausira: Ignore the clown messaging you.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2400.png[/img]


It is not the most difficult mission. This terrible excuse for a highblood has been harassing you for months, trying to convince you he is fit to become your fated kismesis.

Well, he [i]is[/i] a Decapitateball pro player. But you know he has no respect for the fine tradition of the sports, and merely started in order to seduce men, women and nonbinary people of nobility.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2401.png[/img]


You despise him.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2402.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2403.png[/img]


NO. Not in such a way. Never in such a way.

p.c: Ausira: Have your lusus handle it.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2404.png[/img]


You send your trusted caretaker to look after it. Without a doubt it is some kind of dangerous troll or animal - this is Alternia after all.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2405.gif[/img]


You cannot be the child because the child is a canon character. Even an entire sweep before his adventure truly begins, he is outside your control.

This anonymous wriggler may possibly have a partially non-tragical life one of these days, after all.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2406.png[/img]


After half an hour, your lusus is not back from the roof.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2407.png[/img]


Your PRIORITY QUEUE flawlessly delivers your BATTLE ARMOR while your CROSSBOWKIND jumps right into your hand.

p.c: Ausira: Investigate roof. Whoever would be so crass as to BREAK (into) your elegant hivestructure?
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2408.png[/img]


What is this grotesque contraption ?

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2409.png[/img]


You walk towards the vehicle, holding your crossbow firmly, attentive to every sound.

This is not an ordinary kind of flying machine. It lacks shielding, spikes, and this weird overall structure... a trident?

Were it not for the fact that all adults are hundreds of light sweeps away subjugating and destroying inferior species, you would almost think a fighter from Her Imperious Condescension's Navy just crashlanded on your roof.

p.c: Ausira: Look for signs of your lusus.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2410.png[/img]


It is nowhere to be seen; it is not significantly disturbing, though, for you know your lusus to often dive in the sea without warning. Plus, with its high-speed forelimbs, it is perfectly able to dismember even the strongest opponent.

p.c: Ausira: More importantly, where is the occupant? Investigate cockpit.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2411.png[/img]


Nothing except an absurd interface.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2412.png[/img]


You discover with increasing stupefaction there is neither holograms or flight AI, only a flat screen and a bat-shaped wheel.

Furthermore, there are foot pedals mounted on clockwork, and the entire cockpit is extra-padded, as if it was built to accommodate a pilot with a lot of appendages.

What is this lowtech piece of junk?
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2413.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2414.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2415.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2416.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2417.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2418.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2419.png[/img]

You met this asshole on a hunting forum only one week ago and he already manages to bore you to death. Once you've dealt with the current situation, you're going to block him.

Maybe you will pay someone to get him culled, too.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2420.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2421.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2422.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2423.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2424.png[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2425.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2426.png[/img]

So this parent isn't staying in its hive, it is accompanying its child on escapades. This reeks of an adult partnership, lusus and troll working with each other.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2427.png[/img]

You are not facing a kid. You are facing a grown-up about to join the army, or maybe one of the few full-blown adults who manage to avoid conscriptions for sweeps.

Sometimes these deviants can survive on Alternia for sweeps. The drones or the young troll cops always find them in the end, though.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2428.png[/img]

You will speed up the process.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2429.png[/img]

Your laser doors are programmed to let you and your lusus through. And only the two of you.

It makes the hunting of trespassers even easier.
[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2430.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2431.png[/img]

Hmmm. No one so far.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2432.png[/img]

All laser doors open slowly; you calibrated them at the best speed for maximum theatrical effects.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2433.png[/img]

You keep progressing in both curved and straight corridors. Nothing.

You should have checked on the cameras.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2434.png[/img]

You're just BOUND to find the intruder in the last room you visit.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2435.png[/img]

This is your POTTERY AND CERAMIC WORKSHOP.

This passion helps you to alleviate your constant urges of violence and genocide.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2436.png[/img]

Weird. The kiln is turned on.

You did not remember you had a piece in the works.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2437.png[/img]

You wait. The kiln is too hot to be opened right now, even for your resilient chitinous troll skin.

You spend five minutes nibbling on some expensive high-blood biscuits.

You find solace in your sea-dweller patience.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2437b.png[/img]

Aaah... Your world. ALTERNIA. And its major continents, including the proud NACIREMA. You live in the Tbilisic Ocean, but most of your jurisdiction lies in Nacireman lands.

[img]./assets/img/story/doomed2437c.png[/img]

The WORLD MAP, invaluable legacy of countless generations of highbloods, is adorned in ceremonial WORDS OF WISDOM and presented here within a framing of ELEGANT FLYING LUSII and MAJESTIC MUSCLEBEAST TRIUMVIRATES.

From your personal hunting experience, musclebeasts have way more mundane shapes - the usual, a thin, rigid stallion towering over two round beasts -, but they are traditionally represented in Alternian high-caste art following unrealistic and exotic codes. And your decoration is nothing if not traditional.

You spend six full minutes contemplating the map.
